1.name: Easy Prey
1.description: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 200%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.
1.longDescription: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 200%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

1.name: Bird of Prey
1.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.
1.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

1.name: Flare
1.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

4.name: Hungry Bear
4.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

4.name: Hunter-Gatherer
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.
4.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar's Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.

4.name: Grizzled Fortitude
4.description: Every 6 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.
4.longDescription: Every 6 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

4.name: Animal Husbandry
4.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.
4.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

7.name: Aspect of the Beast
7.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 second.

7.name: Crippling Talons
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3.5 seconds.

7.name: Taking Flight
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

10.name: Bestial Wrath
10.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.

10.name: Unleash the Boars
10.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Wildfire Bear
13.description: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
13.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Dire Beast
13.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.
13.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.

16.name: Thrill of the Hunt
16.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Primal Intimidation
16.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Feign Death
16.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.
16.longDescription: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

20.name: Spirit Bond
20.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

20.name: Kill Command
20.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
20.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Hardened Skin
20.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.
20.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

abilities.name: Misha, Focus!
abilities.description: Passive:Misha gains 15% move speed. Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait. Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar. Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.Type: -Targeting: Point target / Unit targetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRadius: GlobalMishaType: SummonProperties: Heroic PetStatistics: Data:MishaSight radius: 7Leash radius: 17.25Killing Misha rewards a Takedown credit and 0.25 Hero kills/XP.Killing Rexxar rewards a Takedown credit and 0.75 Hero kills/XP, when Misha is dead. If Misha is alive while Rexxar is killed, she dies as well, totaling a full Hero kill/XP.Rexxar becomes is unable to control Misha, while he is unable to act (Stunned, Dazed or put in Time Stop or Stasis, other than Feign Death) or Silenced.If Rexxar enters a vehicle or is some other way removed from the battleground, Misha will be removed from the Battleground as well.Issuing Move and Attack commands to Misha doesn't break channels, using abilities will.Rexxar and Misha share the effects of Healing Fountains and Regeneration Globes.

1.name: Silver Touch
1.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.  Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 80 to 60.  Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 40, and its range is increased by 50%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.  Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 80 to 60.  Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 40, and its range is increased by 50%.

1.name: Wave of Light
1.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
1.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.  Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.
1.longDescription: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.  Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

4.name: Holy Shock
4.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.
4.longDescription: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 50% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

4.name: Pursuit of Justice
4.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Holy Fire
4.description: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.
4.longDescription: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

7.name: Armor of Faith
7.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther 90 Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.
7.longDescription: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther 90 Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

7.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
7.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.
7.longDescription: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.

7.name: Hand of Protection
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

10.name: Divine Shield
10.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Divine Storm
10.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Champion
13.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allied Heroes for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.
13.longDescription: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allied Heroes for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

13.name: Well Met
13.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Beacon of Light
16.description: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.
16.longDescription: While below 50% Health, Uther receives 200% more self-healing when healing others with Holy Light.

16.name: Tyr's Deliverance
16.description: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.
16.longDescription: Allies healed by Holy Radiance receive 40% increased healing from all sources for 6 seconds.

16.name: Benediction
16.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Bulwark of Light
20.description: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.
20.longDescription: Divine Shield lasts 2 seconds longer and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Divine Hurricane
20.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.
20.longDescription: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.name: Redemption
20.description: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

20.name: Divine Protection
20.description: Applying Devotion to a Hero that is already affected by Devotion increases their Armor to 50.
20.longDescription: Applying Devotion to a Hero that is already affected by Devotion increases their Armor to 50.

1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, gain an additional 15 Health Regeneration per second.

4.longDescription: Quest: Basic Attacks increase the duration of active Rock-It! Turrets by 1.5 seconds.  Reward: After increasing turret duration by 600 total seconds, reduce the charge cooldown of Rock-It! Turret by 3 seconds.

4.longDescription: Reduces Xplodium Charge's cooldown by 2 seconds.  If Xplodium Charge hits an enemy Hero, gain 2 charges of Rock-It! Turret.

4.longDescription: Enemy Minions that die nearby have a 15% chance to drop Scrap.

4.longDescription: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near Gazlowe deal 50% more damage. Rock-it! Turrets gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing their damage taken by 50%.

7.longDescription: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 60% damage.

7.longDescription: The mana cost of Deth Lazor is reduced by 30 and it charges twice as fast.

10.longDescription: Activate to gain 40 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

13.longDescription: Deth Lazor Slows Heroes by 50% and Stuns non-Heroes for 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Increases Rock-It! Turret maximum charges from 2 to 3.

20.longDescription: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 137 (+4% per level) damage.

1.longDescription: Mal'Ganis heals for 52 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.

4.longDescription: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 11 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 15% more Hero damage into healing.

abilities.name: Fel Claws

The third slash Stuns enemies for 0.75 seconds.Type: Damage / Mobility: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Piercing Skillshot, Stun (third)Cast time:  First & second - 0+0.15 seconds Third - 0.15+0.05 secondsRange:  First & second - 3.25 Third - 4.6025Hitbox:  First & second - 4.25x1.425 Third - 3x2.5End area radius: 2.125 (first & second only)End area arc: 180 degrees (first & second only)Dash speed: 13Dash duration:  First & second - 0.25 seconds Third - 0.3125 secondsReactivate: Fel Claws - Violently slash in the chosen direction, dealing 72 damage.Reactivate time window: 3 secondsCooldown starts immediately upon the first cast.The last part of the first and second dashes' damage area is a half circle.First 0.25 seconds of the third dash' stun knocks the enemies up in the air.

abilities.name: Night Rush
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, gain 50% Movement Speed for 2 seconds. While active, Mal'Ganis can move through enemy Heroes and put them to Sleep for 2.5 seconds.Type: Crowd controlAffects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: No targetProperties: Mobile channel, Movement Speed buff, SleepCast time: 0.75+Ch+0Radius: 1.3Arc: 205 degreesReactivate: Night Rush Cancel - Cancel Night Rush.Mal'Ganis can use Necrotic Embrace during Night Rush without breaking the channel. Using any other ability interrupts Night Rush immediately.Mal'Ganis cannot use Basic Attacks during Night Rush.

abilities.name: Carrion Swarm
abilities.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 126 damage per second to enemies. Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.Type: Damage / Status EffectScaling: 4.00% / -Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Channeled cast (mobile), StasisArea of Effect: Cone x3Radius: 4Arc: 45 degreesTickrate: 2 / s (x6)Damage per tick: 63 / sInterrupting the ability during its cast puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Carrion Swarm's damage area consists of three cones in "opposite" directions that rotate every 0.0625 between three possible orientations. Regardless, enemies can only be damaged by the ability only once every 0.5 seconds.Malganis can move, but not use abilities while channeling and during Carrion Swarm.Carrion Swarm removes most negative effects from Mal'Ganis once the channel finishes and Mal'Ganis enters Stasis.

abilities.name: Dark Conversion
abilities.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.Type: Damage / HealingScaling: -Affects: Enemy Non-Vehicle Heroes / SelfTargeting: Unit TargetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), Damage over time, Heal over time, Percent damageCast time: 0.75+0.15 secondsRange: 3.75Tickrate: 2 / s (x6)First, the ability examines both units' life percent. They get assigned HigherHealth (HH) and LowerHealth (LH). Now their current health is "saved", and a new health is now assigned. HH new health is LH's current health percent, while LH new health is HH current (note these are variables, no damage is done yet). Now two new variables are set, SwapDamage, which is HHcurrent-HHnew and SwapHeal, which is LHnew-LHcurrent, this is done to change from percent to a flat ammount. A DoT of SwapDamage strength is made for HH, and SwapHeal HoT for LH. A visual effect is created then if HH is the casting unit (to add insult to injury).The HoT/DoT ticks 6 times over 3 seconds. Once every 0.5 seconds.Since both the DoT and HoT are flat ammounts, this means that they're both affected by anything that affects those effects. Armor reduces the damage, it can be dispelled by effects like Valeera's Cloak of Shadows, and you can multiply the heal by effects such as Valeera's Wound Poison. If the DoT is removed, you'll still get healed. If both heroes have the exact same hp percent, then Mal'Ganis gets a 0 damage DoT while the opponent gets a 0 damage HoT.Interrupting the ability puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Cast is interrupted, if the target moves 3 range past its maximum range.Dark Conversion damage is not affected by the lifesteal from Vampiric Touch.If Mal'Ganis has higher percentage of health than the target enemy hero, the ability will damage Mal'Ganis while healing enemy hero. It can even deal fatal damage to Mal'Ganis.

7.longDescription: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.longDescription: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Bloodlust
10.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.longDescription: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 225 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by 0.75 seconds for each Hero healed, and reduces its Mana cost from 55 to 40.

13.longDescription: Lightning Shield gives Heroes a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

16.name: Rising Storm
16.description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.  Every time either Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase the damage of both Lightning Shields by 10%. Stacks up to 15 times.
16.longDescription: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.  Every time either Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase the damage of both Lightning Shields by 10%. Stacks up to 15 times.

16.longDescription: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

16.longDescription: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.

20.longDescription: Increases Bloodlust's healing from 30% to 60% of Basic Attack damage done.

20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

1.longDescription: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

4.longDescription: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

4.longDescription: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

13.longDescription: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

16.longDescription: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

20.name: Reaper of Souls
20.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.
20.longDescription: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

20.name: Angel of Death
20.description: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.
20.longDescription: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

20.name: Final Curtain
20.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.
20.longDescription: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

20.name: No One Can Stop Death
20.description: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.
20.longDescription: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

abilities.name: Reaper's Mark

1.name: Advanced Targeting
1.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

1.name: Arsenal Synergy
1.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.
1.longDescription: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

1.name: Mobile Offense
1.description: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.
1.longDescription: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

4.name: Target Acquired
4.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Inhibiting Energy
4.description: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes Slow all enemies in the area by 30% for 3 seconds. Does not spread from Inhibiting Energy's Slow.
4.longDescription: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes Slow all enemies in the area by 30% for 3 seconds. Does not spread from Inhibiting Energy's Slow.

4.name: Emergency Protocol
4.description: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: When Shield Capacitor's Shield becomes depleted, gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

7.name: Combat Advantage
7.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.
7.longDescription: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

7.name: Warp Warfare
7.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.
7.longDescription: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

7.name: Divert Power: Weapons
7.description: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.

10.name: Purification Salvo
10.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
10.longDescription: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

10.name: Planet Cracker
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

13.name: Adanium Shell
13.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Dampening Field
13.description: Fenix gains 25 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
13.longDescription: Fenix gains 25 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

13.name: Rapid Recharge
13.description: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.
13.longDescription: Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

13.name: Auxiliary Shields
13.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.
13.longDescription: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Offensive Cadence
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Photonic Weaponry
16.description: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
16.longDescription: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
16.description: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Secondary Fire
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
20.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

20.name: Singularity Charge
20.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.
20.longDescription: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.

20.name: Unconquered Spirit
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

1.longDescription: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.

1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

4.longDescription: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

4.longDescription: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther.  Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60.  Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

7.longDescription: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

7.longDescription: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

7.longDescription: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 120% of the damage against Heroes and 55% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

10.longDescription: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 0.5 seconds. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 50% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.

10.longDescription: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

13.name: Blinding Flash

13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.

13.name: Converging Force
13.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

13.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.longDescription: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

16.longDescription: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

20.longDescription: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

20.longDescription: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

20.longDescription: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

20.longDescription: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

1.longDescription: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 0.75%.

1.description: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.
1.longDescription: Deal 15% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.

1.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 100% while Inspire is active.

4.longDescription: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

4.longDescription: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 50.  While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 50.  While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

7.longDescription: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%, and enemies hit by it are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

7.description: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.

The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

13.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Penetrating Round from 65 to 45, and its cooldown by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

13.longDescription: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

13.name: Giddy-Up

13.longDescription: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.

16.longDescription: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

16.longDescription: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

16.longDescription: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 10 Armor for 3 seconds.  Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

20.longDescription: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush

Lasts 12 seconds.Hyperion shoots once per second and Yamato Cannon once per 4 seconds.Hyperion grants vision over the area.

abilities.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.The Banshee Hearths back to the base with Raynor.

1.name: Convection
1.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

1.name: Fel Infusion
1.description: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.
1.longDescription: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

1.name: Mana Addict
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

4.name: Nether Wind
4.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.
4.longDescription: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

4.name: Energy Roil
4.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

4.name: Mana Tap
4.description: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.
4.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

7.name: Burned Flesh
7.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.
7.longDescription: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Sun King's Fury
7.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.
7.longDescription: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Sunfire Enchantment
7.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

10.name: Phoenix
10.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Pyroblast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

13.name: Pyromaniac
13.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Backdraft
13.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Fission Bomb
13.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.
13.longDescription: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
16.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.
16.longDescription: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.name: Ignite
16.description: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.
16.longDescription: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

16.name: Twin Spheres
16.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.
16.longDescription: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

20.name: Rebirth
20.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.
20.longDescription: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

20.name: Presence Of Mind
20.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

20.name: Master of Flames
20.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.
20.longDescription: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.name: Flamethrower
20.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Verdant Spheres
abilities.description: Activate to make your next Basic Ability more powerful.

abilities.name: Flamestrike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 345 (+4% per level) damage in an area.Verdant Spheres increases the radius by 50%.

abilities.name: Living Bomb
abilities.description: Deal 120 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to an enemy, then they explode dealing 215 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies. Other Heroes damaged by this explosion are also affected by Living Bomb, though the secondary explosions cannot spread. Verdant Spheres makes this Ability cost no Mana and have no cooldown.Living bomb deals 3 ticks of 42 damage before exploding.

abilities.name: Gravity Lapse
abilities.description: Stun the first enemy hit for 1 seconds. Verdant Spheres causes Gravity Lapse to stun the first 3 enemies hit and increases the stun duration by 50%.

abilities.name: Pyroblast
abilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.Cast time is a 1.5 second stationary channel.

abilities.name: Phoenix
abilities.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 50%.Phoenix is untargetable and invulnerable and has no collision.Phoenix attacks the nearest enemy to the center, prioritizing Heroes.Phoenix' attacks deal Spell Damage.Phoenix attacks 13 times during it's duration, dealing total of 1014 damage and 507 splash damage.

1.name: Fish Eye
1.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

1.name: Egg Hunt
1.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

1.name: A Fishy Deal
1.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.
1.longDescription: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

4.name: Slime Time
4.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 10 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 20 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 10 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 20 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

4.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.
4.longDescription: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

4.name: Living the Dream
4.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 25%. This bonus is reset upon his death.
4.longDescription: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 25%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

7.name: Black Lagoon
7.description: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.
7.longDescription: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

7.name: Slippery When Wet

7.longDescription: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Time to Krill

7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

10.name: March of the Murlocs
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

10.name: Octo-Grab
10.description: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.
10.longDescription: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

13.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

13.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.
13.longDescription: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

13.name: Fish Tank
13.description: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.
13.longDescription: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

16.name: Toxic Buildup

16.longDescription: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

16.longDescription: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

16.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

20.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
20.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.
20.longDescription: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

20.name: ... And a Shark Too!
20.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).
20.longDescription: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).

20.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
20.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.
20.longDescription: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

20.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave grants Lcio a 35 (+4% per level) Shield for 7 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes grants 3 times this amount.

7.longDescription: Blast Lcio's active Crossfade track at enemy Heroes. While Amp It Up is active, Healing Boost deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost Slows by 20%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.

7.longDescription: Place a boombox that plays Lcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It Up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

10.longDescription: After 1 second, Lcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

10.longDescription: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250 (+4% per level).

13.longDescription: Push Off no longer Slows enemies, and instead Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.

13.longDescription: While Wall Ride is active, passing near an enemy Hero increases its Movement Speed bonus to 40% for 1 second.  Passive: Wall Ride grants 20 Armor.

7.name: Molten Power

7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

7.name: Blistering Attacks
7.description: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

10.name: Sulfuras Smash
10.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 198 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Lava Wave
10.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.
10.longDescription: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

13.name: Cauterize Wounds
13.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

13.name: Tempered Flame
13.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

13.name: Resilient Flame
13.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

16.name: Giant Scorcher
16.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.
16.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

16.name: Meteor Bomb
16.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

16.name: Blast Echo
16.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.
16.longDescription: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

20.name: Flames of Sulfuron
20.description: Sulfuras Smash Slows enemies by 50% for 2.5 seconds, and the Stun duration of enemies hit in the center is increased by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Sulfuras Smash Slows enemies by 50% for 2.5 seconds, and the Stun duration of enemies hit in the center is increased by 1 second.

20.name: Lava Surge
20.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Heroic Difficulty
20.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.
20.longDescription: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

20.name: Submerge
20.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Molten Core
abilities.description: Channel on an allied or destroyed Fort or Keep to replace it with Ragnaros's ultimate form, temporarily gaining new Abilities, having 3996 Health that burns away over 18 seconds. Ragnaros returns to his normal form upon losing all Health in Molten Core.Type: TransformationScaling: 4.00% (health & decay)Affects: Allied or destroyed Forts & KeepsTargeting: Unit targetProperties: Channeled cast, Heroic Target, StasisCast time: 2(ch)+0 secondsRange: 5.75Health decay: 222 per secondInterrupting Molten Core during its cast puts it on 10 second cooldown.Entering Molten Core puts real Ragnaros in a special Stasis, removing most debuffs and making him untargetable and immune to damage until Molten Core ends.Ragnaros can exit Molten Core after a 1 second channel by reactivating the Trait. Exiting can be cancelled by pressing the Trait button again before channel is complete.Ragnaros cannot be targeted by friendly abilities during Molten Core, but buffs and HoTs applied before hand persist for their duration.Molten Core Ragnaros cannot be targeted or affected by Abathur's Ultimate Evolution, Sylvanas' Black Arrow disable or Zagara's Devouring Maw.

abilities.name: Empower Sulfuras
abilities.description: Ragnaros's next Basic Attack is instant, dealing 191 Ability damage in an area, and heals for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing doubled versus Heroes.Molten Core: Molten SwingStun and damage nearby enemies.Type: Attack modifier, Spell damage / HealingScaling: 4.00% / -Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Lifesteal, Primed, SplashCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 3.5Cooldown starts when the Ability is triggered by attacking an enemy.Empower Sulfuras will miss completely and the Abilitys cooldown will be consumed if Ragnaros is Blinded or the primary target of the attack is Evading. Evading targets can still get hit by the splash damage as long as the primary attack connects.

4.longDescription: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

4.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

4.longDescription: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.3.

7.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings, and they deal 20% more damage.
7.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings, and they deal 20% more damage.

7.longDescription: Banelings Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

7.longDescription: Quest: Passively increases the radius of Infested Drop by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.

10.name: Devouring Maw
10.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.
10.longDescription: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

10.name: Nydus Network
10.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.

13.longDescription: Zagara is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

13.longDescription: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 7 seconds and its Mana cost by 30.

16.longDescription: When used against Heroes, Hunter Killers deal additional damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health.

16.description: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

20.name: Tyrant Maw
20.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

20.name: Endless Creep
20.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.
20.longDescription: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

abilities.name: Creep Tumor
abilities.description: Lay a Creep Tumor that generates Creep. While on Creep, Zagara gains 20% additional attack range and both Zagara and her summons move 20% faster. Tumors last 240 seconds.

abilities.name: Baneling Barrage
abilities.description: Launch 1 Baneling that deals 86 (+4% per level) splash damage.

abilities.name: Hunter Killer
abilities.description: Summon a Hydralisk to attack a single target, dealing 71 (+5% per level) damage per second. Lasts 8 seconds. Damage dealt by the Hydralisk summon is not reduced by Armor.

abilities.name: Infested Drop
abilities.description: Bombard target area with a Zerg Drop Pod for 147 (+4% per level) damage. The pod spawns 2 Roachlings that deal 27 (+4% per level) damage per second and last for 8 seconds. Damage dealt by the Roach summons is not reduced by Armor.

abilities.name: Devouring Maw
abilities.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 88 (+4% per level) damage per second. Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

abilities.name: Nydus Network
abilities.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second. Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Boneslicer
1.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.
1.longDescription: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Recklessness
1.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.
1.longDescription: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.

1.name: Headhunter
1.description: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.
1.longDescription: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

4.longDescription: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

4.name: Voodoo Shuffle

4.longDescription: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

4.description: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.
4.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.

7.name: Vicious Assault

7.longDescription: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 35%.

7.longDescription: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

7.name: Ferocity
7.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.
7.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

10.name: Taz'dingo!

10.longDescription: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

10.name: Guillotine
10.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.
10.longDescription: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

13.name: Lacerate

13.longDescription: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.

13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ensnare
13.description: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: No Mercy!
16.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.
16.longDescription: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
16.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.
16.longDescription: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

16.name: Let the Killing Begin
16.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

20.name: Amani Resilience
20.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.
20.longDescription: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

20.name: Buzzsaw
20.description: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.
20.longDescription: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

20.name: Forest Medicine
20.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.
20.longDescription: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

abilities.name: Berserker
abilities.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage by 25% but consume 2% maximum Health per attack.Passive: Zul'jin attacks 1% faster for every 1% of maximum Health missing.You Want Axe?  Quest: Every 5 Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increases Basic Attack damage by 1. Reward: After attacking 75 times, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1. Reward: After attacking 150 times, Twin Cleave now revolves twice.Continues to gain stacks even after the quests are completed.Bonus damage from You want Axe? is affected by damage multipliers, but not by Scaling.

abilities.name: Amani Rage
abilities.description: Activate to cause Zul'jin to instantly lose 50% of his current Health and heal for that amount over 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Grievous Throw
abilities.description: Zul'jin throws an axe forward, dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage to the first 2 enemies hit and marking them for 6 seconds. Marked enemies take 50% bonus damage from Zul'jin's next 3 Basic Attacks against them.

abilities.name: Twin Cleave
abilities.description: Throw 2 axes in a large, circular arc, dealing 116 damage and Slowing affected enemies by 15% per axe for 2 seconds.Twin Cleave's axes return and revolve from the initial cast location, regardless of where Zul'jin is.

abilities.name: Regeneration
abilities.description: Zul'jin channels to regenerate 30% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. Moving while channeling or taking damage will interrupt this effect.Damage over Time effects applied before cast do not interrupt Regeneration.

abilities.name: Taz'dingo!
abilities.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

abilities.name: Guillotine
abilities.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.This cannot be interrupted, once cast.Bonus damage is a percentage of the base damage and can be calculated using formula y = x2 / 50 where x stands for percentage of health missing. Maximum bonus damage is 200%.

1.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.
1.longDescription: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

4.longDescription: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.  Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.  Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 40% Movement and Attack Speed.

7.longDescription: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

7.longDescription: Increase the Attack Speed reduction of Cursed Strikes by 35% and the duration by 1 second.

7.longDescription: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 570 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

13.longDescription: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

13.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Amplify Damage
16.description: Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Image Transmission
abilities.description: Activate to switch places with a target Mirror Image, removing most negative effects from Samuro and the Mirror Image.Type: Movement: TeleportAffects: Self, ImagesTargeting: Unit targetProperties: StasisCast time: 0+0.125 secondsRange: GlobalSamuro can not use Image Transmission on target Image that is Stunned, Silenced, in Stasis or in Time Stop.Using Image Transission to swap between Images puts Samuro and his Images in a special Stasis for 0.125 seconds, when the Ability is being cast, removing debuffs from them and making them briefly untargetable and immune to damage, regardless of which Image was targetted.All of Samuro's Mirror Images' Health is set to match the percentage of Samuro's current Health, when the swap is finished.Using Image Transmission during Wind Walk's Unrevealable period doesn't break Stealth, but using it after Unrevealable period is over will. Real Samuro retains Stealth over the swap.Advancing Strikes Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.Properties: Attack ModifierAdvancing Strikes and the Talents enhancing it work independently on Samuro and each of his Mirror Images.

abilities.name: Mirror Image
abilities.description: Teleport a short distance in the direction of the mouse cursor, creating 2 images for 18 seconds with 100% of Samuro's current Health that Basic Attack enemies for 9 damage. Whenever an Image takes damage, it deals that amount of damage to itself, effectively doubling the damage it takes.Maximum 2 Mirror images can be active at a time. Using Mirror Image removes most negative effects from Samuro.Type: Summon / Movement: TeleportTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, StasisCast time: 0+0.125 secondsRange: 3.5Mirror ImageType: Heroic Pet, CloneScaling: 4.00% (damage)Targeting: AutomaticHealth: 50%Basic Attack damage: 9Attack speed: 100%Attack range: 100%Movement Speed: 100%Sight radius: 100%Leash radius: -Samuro appears in the direction of the player's Mouse Cursor, when Mirror Image is cast. Samuro and his Mirror Images spawn in an equilateral triangle around the point where Samuro was standing when the ability was cast.Using Mirror Image puts Samuro in  a special Stasis for 0.125 seconds when the Ability is being cast, removing debuffs from Samuro and making him briefly untargetable and immune to damage.Mirror Images deal the same type of damage than Samuro does.Mirror Images gain all benefits from Samuro's Trait and Talents affecting it.Mirror Images can be affected by Regeneration Globes' healing, but not pick them up themselves. The effect is not shared between Samuro and his Images.Killing Mirror Images rewards no XP or Takedown credit.All Mirror Images are destroyed, when real Samuro successfully Hearths.

abilities.name: Critical Strike
abilities.description: Samuro's next Basic Attack within 8 seconds will be a Critical Strike, dealing 50% increased damage. This also applies to Images, and does not break Wind Walk.Passive: Samuro and his Images deal a Critical Strike on every 4th Basic Attack.Type: Damage modifierAffects: Self, ImagesTargeting: No targetProperties: Attack ModifierCast time: InstantDoes not stack with itself. Activating sets Samuro's next attack to be critical strike (regardless of if it already was), putting the ability on cooldown.Stacks additively with other damage modifiers affecting Samuro's Basic Attack damage.Causes Samuro's next Basic Attack to strike immediately.

abilities.name: Wind Walk
abilities.description: Grant Samuro Stealth for up to 10 seconds or until he attacks, uses an Ability, or takes damage.While Stealthed, Samuro's Movement Speed is increased by 25% and he can pass through other units. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.Samuro is Unrevealable for the first 1 second of Wind Walk.Type: Status effectAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: StealthCast time: InstantUsing Mirror Image and Mounting during Unrevealable period will break Stealth once the period ends.

abilities.name: Bladestorm
abilities.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 4 seconds, making him Unstoppable and dealing 235 damage per second to nearby enemies.Type: Spell damage / Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Mobile channel, UnstoppableCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 4.25Tickrate: 5.0 per second (x20)Damage per tick: 47Bladestorm can be ended prematurely by reactivating the ability.Samuro can move, but not use any abilities, while Bladestorm is active.

abilities.name: Illusion Master
abilities.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 10 seconds.Type: Damage modifierAffects: ImagesIllusion bonus damage stacks additively with other damage modifiers.Illusion Master active shares cooldown with Image Transmission, and has all the same properties.Mirror Images have a copy of Illusion Master active and Image Transmission, both of which swap the Image using it with Samuro. The cooldown is shared between Samuro and all his Images.Mirror Images can Mount, Hearth and drink from Healing Fountains. The effect and cooldowns are independent from Samuro and his other Images, including those that have expired.Images can fake capturing Objectives.A Mirror Image Hearthing does not destroy any Mirror Images, but real Samuro Hearthing still does.
