16.longDescription: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it instantly deals an additional 15% of the target's maximum Health as damage. This damage does not heal Leoric.

16.name: Royal Focus
16.description: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.
16.longDescription: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

16.name: Mithril Mace
16.description: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%.  Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.
16.longDescription: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%.  Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

20.name: Buried Alive
20.description: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.
20.longDescription: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

20.name: Death March
20.description: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.name: Hardened Bones
20.description: Gain 50 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Gain 50 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 2 seconds.

20.name: Burning Despair
20.description: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.
20.longDescription: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

20.name: Shroud of the Dead King
20.description: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.
20.longDescription: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

abilities.name: Undying
abilities.description: Leoric becomes a ghost when he dies, and resurrects upon reaching full Health. Leoric deals no damage while dead.Type: Special death stateAffects: SelfProperties: Untargetable by everythingLeoric can use Ghastly Swing (Q), Drain Essence (W) and Hearth and provide vision while Undying. Leoric cannot use other abilities or interact with other units in any other way while Undying, unless otherwise noted.Reaching full health while Undying automatically resurrects at his current location after 1 second. Leoric is still Undying, but unable to act for the duration of the resurrection sequence.Wrath Of The Bone KingLeoric's first two Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage, and his third Basic Attack deals 200% damage to a single target.Type: Attack modifier / Damage modifierAffects: SelfProperties: SplashCleave radius: 3.5Cleave arc: 220 degrees

abilities.name: Skeletal Swing
abilities.description: Leoric swings his mace, dealing 150 damage and Slowing enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, refund 50% of the cooldown and Mana cost. Peasants!Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, SlowCast time: 0.15+0.1875 secondsRadius: 5Arc: 180 degrees

abilities.name: Ghastly Swing
abilities.description: Slow enemies by 40% for 2.5 seconds.Type: Non-damagingAffects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, SlowCast time: 0.15+0.1875 secondsRadius: 5Arc: 180 degreesDoes not benefit from talents affecting Skeletal Swing.

abilities.name: Drain Hope
abilities.description: Grab an enemy Hero's soul, dealing up to 20% of their maximum Health as damage and healing Leoric for up to 20% of his maximum Health while he is nearby, over 4 seconds. Leoric is Slowed by 20% while this is active.Type: Damage / HealingScaling: -Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Percent damage, Skillshot, Self-SlowCast time: 0.15+0 secondsRange: 8Hitbox: 1.25x1.5Tickrate: 2 / second (x8)

abilities.name: Drain Essence
abilities.description: Throw out a chain, attaching to the first enemy Hero hit, healing Leoric for up to 10% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds as long as the enemy remains close.Type: HealingScaling: -Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, SkillshotCast time: 0.15+0 secondsRange: 8Hitbox: 1.25x1.5Tickrate: 2 / second (x8)Does not benefit from talents affecting Drain Hope.

abilities.name: Wraith Walk
abilities.description: Separate from your body, becoming Unstoppable and gaining Movement Speed accelerating up to 50% over 2.5 seconds. When Wraith Walk ends or is canceled, your body jumps to your wraith.Type: Mobility: TeleportTargeting: No targetProperties: UnstoppableCast time: InstantReactivate: Cancel Wraith Walk - Cancels Wraith WalkLeoric's ghost is an invulnerable summon that moves at regular Movement speed.Ghost's Movement speed can be affected by conveyor belts in Volskaya Foundry.Unaffected by Roots.Unstoppable is removed before teleporting to ghost.

abilities.name: Entomb
abilities.description: Create an unpathable tomb in front of you for 4 seconds.Type: Terrain objectAffects: All unitsTargeting: Point targetProperties: ClampingCast time: 0.0625+0.875 secondsInner length: 7Outer length: 8Inner width: 4Outer width: 6.5Delay: 0.1875 seconds

abilities.name: March of the Black King
abilities.description: Become Unstoppable and swing your mace three times, healing yourself for 12% of your maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing 250 damage.Type: Damage / Healing / Mobility: DashScaling: 4.00% (damage)/ - (healing)Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, UnstoppableCast time: 0+2.5 secondsRange: 8.125Swing radius: 2.5Swing arc: 270 degreesSwings take place at 0.31/1.31/2.31 seconds (or  distancewise at 1/4.25/7.5).

1.name: The Plaguelands
1.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

1.name: Blighted Frost
1.description: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Barbed Chains
1.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.

4.name: Strip Shields
4.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.
4.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.

4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
4.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.
4.longDescription: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

4.name: Armor of the Archlich
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Accelerated Decay
7.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
7.longDescription: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

7.name: Chilling Touch
7.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 100%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 100%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Ice Cold
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 8 seconds and increase its damage by 400%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 8 seconds and increase its damage by 400%.

10.name: Frost Blast
10.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.
10.longDescription: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.

10.name: Shadow Fissure
10.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Icy Grasp
13.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 15%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by 0.4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 15%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by 0.4 seconds.

13.name: Chains of Ice
13.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.
13.longDescription: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

13.name: Chain-Link
13.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.
13.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

16.name: Arcane Echoes
16.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Hungering Cold
16.description: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.
16.longDescription: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

16.name: Power of Icecrown
16.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Deathchill
20.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.
20.longDescription: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

20.name: Might of the Scourge
20.description: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them 1 second later.  This second cast will not duplicate itself.
20.longDescription: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them 1 second later.  This second cast will not duplicate itself.

20.name: Shifting Malice
20.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.
20.longDescription: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

20.name: The Damned Return
20.description: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.
20.longDescription: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

abilities.name: Master of the Cold Dark
abilities.description: Quest: Gain 1 Blight every time a Hero is Rooted by Frost Nova or hit by Chains of Kel'Thuzad. Reward: After gaining 15 Blight, unlock the Glacial Spike ability. Activate to create a spike that detonates after 4 seconds, dealing 60 (+2.5% per level) damage to nearby enemies. The spike can be affected by Chains of Kel'Thuzad. 30 second cooldown. Reward: After gaining 30 Blight, gain 75% Spell Power.

abilities.name: Death and Decay
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds, launch an orb that explodes upon hitting an enemy, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. The explosion leaves behind a pool of decay that lasts 2 seconds, dealing 82 (+2.5% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies.

abilities.name: Frost Nova
abilities.description: Create a nova that explodes after 1 second, dealing 180 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies inside and Slowing them by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in the center are Rooted for 1 second.

abilities.name: Chains of Kel'Thuzad
abilities.description: Launch a chain, dealing 97 (+2.5% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit. For 3 seconds after hitting an enemy, Chains of Kel'Thuzad can be reactivated to launch to an additional enemy, pulling both enemies together and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.Chain is launched from primary target towards target point on reactivation.

abilities.name: Frost Blast
abilities.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 100 (+2.5% per level)  damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level)  damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frozen Tomb are Rooted for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Shadow Fissure
abilities.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, reset its cooldown.

1.name: Monster Hunter
1.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.
1.longDescription: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

1.name: Caltrops
1.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.  Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.  Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and its Mana cost is reduced from 50 to 25.
1.longDescription: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.  Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.  Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and its Mana cost is reduced from 50 to 25.

1.name: Hot Pursuit
1.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.
1.longDescription: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

4.name: Puncturing Arrow
4.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.  Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.  Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

4.name: Punishment
4.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.
4.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

4.name: Creed of the Hunter
4.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.  Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.  Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.
4.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.  Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.  Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

7.name: Arsenal
7.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

7.name: Death Dealer
7.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.
7.longDescription: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

7.name: Repeating Arrow
7.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.
7.longDescription: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Vengeance
10.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.
10.longDescription: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Siphoning Arrow
13.description: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.
13.longDescription: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

13.name: Tempered by Discipline
13.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.
13.longDescription: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Gloom
13.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.
13.longDescription: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

16.name: Frost Shot
16.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Seething Hatred
16.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain 15% Spell Power. Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred.
16.longDescription: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain 15% Spell Power. Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred.

16.name: Manticore
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Death Siphon
20.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.
20.longDescription: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

20.name: Storm of Vengeance
20.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

20.name: Rancor
20.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.
20.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

20.name: Farflight Quiver
20.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.
20.longDescription: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

abilities.name: Hatred
abilities.description: Basic Attacks grant a stack of Hatred, up to 10. Each Hatred stack increases Basic Attack damage by 8% and Movement Speed by 1%. Last 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Hungering Arrow
abilities.description: Fire an arrow that deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit, then seeks up to 2 additional enemies dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage. Can hit an enemy multiple times.

abilities.name: Multishot
abilities.description: Deal 172 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within the target area.

abilities.name: Vault
abilities.description: Dash to the target area. Valla's next Basic Attack within 2 second deals 6% increased damage per stack of Hatred.

abilities.name: Strafe
abilities.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.Strafe targets up to 3 enemies closest to Valla that she has "line of sight" on and fires a bolt at one of them every 0.125 seconds. Strafe can hit the same target only once per 0.3125 seconds.Strafe can deal up to 660 damage to single target, or up to 1980 damage total.

abilities.name: Rain of Vengeance
abilities.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.Rain of Vengeance has 0.6 second delay before impact.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.description: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Fingers of Frost
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.
4.longDescription: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.
4.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.
4.longDescription: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 6 seconds per use.
7.longDescription: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, up to a maximum of 6 seconds per use.

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 10 Mana.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

7.name: Icefury Wand
7.description: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 100% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 100% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 2 seconds.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.
13.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.description: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 20%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 60%.
16.longDescription: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 20%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 60%.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 20 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 20%.
16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 20 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 20%.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.
16.longDescription: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Ice Blink
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

20.longDescription: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

Reward: Unlock the Improved Ice Block ability. Activate to place Jaina in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 2.5 seconds. When this effect expires, nearby enemies are Chilled. 40 second cooldown.Chill is applied after damage is dealt.

abilities.description: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage and Chill targets.Deals 345 damage against Chilled targets.

1.longDescription: Increase the healing received from damaging Heroes with Lightning Surge by 40%.

1.name: Extended Lightning
1.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.
1.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

1.name: Ruthless Momentum
1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20.  Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 75% faster while above 75% Health.
1.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20.  Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 75% faster while above 75% Health.

4.name: Chaos Reigns
4.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Negatively Charged
4.description: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 150%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.

4.name: Show of Force
4.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 65 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.   Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 65 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.   Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.

7.name: Dissonance
7.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Hindered Motion
7.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 25% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Applied Force
7.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.
7.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.
10.longDescription: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

10.name: Counter-Strike
10.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Blade of the Highlord
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% stacking up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% stacking up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.

13.name: Pure Malice
13.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
13.description: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

16.name: Lethal Onslaught
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Lightning Barrage
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

16.name: Mocking Strikes
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 3 seconds.

20.name: Counter-Strike
20.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

abilities.description: Push enemies away, and Slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.Always pushes a set distance regardless of the distance between Falstad and the affected enemy.

abilities.name: Flight
abilities.description: Instead of mounting, Falstad can fly a great distance over terrain.Type: Movement: LaunchProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), Unstoppable, UntargetableCast time: 2.0(ch)+0 secondsRange: 75Cast can be cancelled by issuing a 'move' or 'stop' command or interrupted by enemy abilities that Stun, Silence, Stasis or Knockback. Taking damage does not interrupt the cast.Interrupting the channel in any way puts Flight on a 10 second cooldoown.

1.name: Might of the Banshee Queen

1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

1.longDescription: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

4.longDescription: Minions that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 116 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Does not damage Heroes or Structures.

4.longDescription: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

4.longDescription: Force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team.  Stores up to 3 charges.

7.longDescription: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.

7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.

7.longDescription: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 25%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

10.name: Wailing Arrow

10.longDescription: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

10.longDescription: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

13.longDescription: Shadow Dagger lowers the Armor of the initial enemy by 25 for 2 seconds, causing them to take 25% more damage.

13.longDescription: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

16.longDescription: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

16.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

20.longDescription: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.

20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

20.longDescription: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm

20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

abilities.name: Black Arrows
abilities.description: Activate to cause all Basic Attacks and Abilities to Stun Minions, non-Elite Mercenaries, and Structures for 3 seconds. Lasts for 10 seconds.Banshee's CurseBasic Attacks infect enemies with Banshee's Curse for 3 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. Deal 25% more damage to enemies with 3 stacks.

abilities.name: Withering Fire
abilities.description: Shoot the closes enemy up to 5 times over 1.5 seconds for 39 damage, prirotizing Heroes. Cooldown is reset on getting a Takedown.Type: Spell damageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesRange: 8Can only be used if an enemy is in 8 range.Consumes charges every .375 seconds.The ability is disabled until you use all charges.

abilities.name: Shadow Dagger
abilities.description: Throw a dagger at a target enemy thatl deals 30 damage and an additional 150 damage over 2.5 seconds. Damage dealt by Sylvanas to the initial target spreads Shadow Dagger to all nearby enemies.Type: Spell damageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesCast time: 0.1875Range: 8Tickrate: 2 per secondThe damage is done on impact and a DoT ticks 5 times during 2.5 seconds.On impact, the main target gets to spread the debuff over 2.5 seconds. They are shown with an unique icon on top. The spread is done as a damage response and affects units in a 3.5 radius, extended by the main target unit's radius. It validates if the units are not a wall, invulnerable, cloaked and not revealed, has shadow dagger from the caster Sylvanas. If they fit all that, impact them with the spread one tick later.

abilities.name: Haunting Wave
abilities.description: Send forth a wave of banshees dealing 114 damage to all targets. If you press E during that time, you'll teleport to the Banshee.

Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.  Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

16.longDescription: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

20.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

20.longDescription: Activate to deal 75 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

4.longDescription: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second.  When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.

7.longDescription: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

7.longDescription: Noxious Blossom deals 100% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 150% against enemies with 3 stacks.

7.longDescription: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

10.longDescription: Send forth vines that deal 176 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

13.longDescription: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

16.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from 60 to 40.  While at least 2 enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

16.longDescription: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

20.longDescription: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

20.longDescription: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

abilities.description: Lunara moves 20% faster by leaping short distances.Lunara cannot mount.

1.longDescription: For 10 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them restores 15 Mana and 2.5% of his maximum Health.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

4.name: Feral Resilience
4.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.
4.longDescription: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

4.name: Frostwolf Pack
4.description: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

4.name: Mana Tide
4.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Maelstrom Weapon
7.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.
7.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

7.name: Ancestral Wrath
7.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.
7.longDescription: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Sundering
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

10.name: Earthquake
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

13.name: Grace Of Air
13.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.
13.longDescription: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

13.name: Frostwolf's Grace
13.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.
13.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.

13.name: Spirit Shield
13.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Tempest Fury
16.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.
16.longDescription: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

16.name: Thunderstorm
16.description: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.
16.longDescription: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.

16.name: Alpha Wolf
16.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

20.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

20.name: Earthen Shields

20.longDescription: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Wind Rush

20.longDescription: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

7.longDescription: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

10.longDescription: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

10.longDescription: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 40% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

abilities.description: Swipe towards the area in front of you for 126 (+4% per level) damage. Human Form: Gilnean CocktailUsable only in Worgen form.Razor Swipe can move through units.

abilities.description: Hurl a flask that deals 55 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit and explodes for 220 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone behind them. Worgen Form: Razor SwipeUsable only in Human form.

abilities.name: Darkflight

abilities.name: Go for the Throat

10.name: Seven-Sided Strike

10.longDescription: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

13.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Sixth Sense

13.longDescription: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Cleansing Touch
16.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.
16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

16.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
16.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.
16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

16.name: Echo of Heaven
16.description: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.
16.longDescription: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

20.name: Peaceful Repose

20.longDescription: Divine Palm's cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.name: Transgression
20.description: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.
20.longDescription: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Epiphany
20.description: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.
20.longDescription: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

abilities.description: Choose between Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight from the Talents panel.In order to receive bonuses from Transcendence, Iron Fists, and Insight, the Basic Attacks should hit enemies within 3 seconds from each other, or the counter resets.

1.longDescription: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt.

4.longDescription: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by 66% and increase its splash damage to 100% of its base damage.

4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.

4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.

7.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

10.longDescription: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.longDescription: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.longDescription: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Whirlwind deals an additional 50 (+4% per level) damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

13.name: No Escape

13.longDescription: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.25% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for the damage dealt.

16.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 0.5 seconds.

16.longDescription: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

20.longDescription: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

20.name: Striding Giant
20.description: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

20.longDescription: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

20.longDescription: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

7.longDescription: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

7.longDescription: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

13.longDescription: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

13.longDescription: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 15% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).

13.longDescription: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

16.longDescription: Increase Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.

16.name: Celerity
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 1.5 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 1.5 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.  While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 35% Attack Speed.

20.longDescription: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125%, and its Armor bonus to 75 for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards.

20.longDescription: Increase the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.

20.longDescription: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

20.longDescription: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.

13.description: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Revitalize
13.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 50 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

16.name: Ysera's Gift
16.description: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.
16.longDescription: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

16.name: Nature's Balance
16.description: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

16.name: Moonlit Harmony
16.description: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.
16.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Serenity
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.
20.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Astral Communion
20.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

20.name: Lifebloom
20.description: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.
20.longDescription: Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

20.name: Lunar Shower
20.description: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.
20.longDescription: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.
1.longDescription: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

1.name: Frost Presence
1.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.
1.longDescription: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.

1.name: Rime
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 2 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 2 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

4.name: Icy Talons
4.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.
4.longDescription: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.
4.longDescription: Reduces Death Coil's cooldown by 3 seconds and increase its range by 30%.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 4% of his max Health.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.
7.longDescription: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.
10.longDescription: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Shattered Armor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Biting Cold
13.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.
13.longDescription: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are Rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are Rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.
16.longDescription: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.
16.longDescription: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.
20.longDescription: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls heal for an additional 50% and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 3.5 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.
20.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increases Movement Speed by 10%.

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.
20.longDescription: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 3 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.
