1.name: Tricky Shuffles
1.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains 10% Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal 15% bonus damage.
1.longDescription: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains 10% Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal 15% bonus damage.

1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
1.description: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals 60% bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.
1.longDescription: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals 60% bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

1.name: Blow 'Em Up!
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal 25% more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal 25% more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for 6 seconds.

4.name: Taste For Explosions
4.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.

4.name: BOOM POW
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 8 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 8 seconds.

4.name: Chattering Teeth
4.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

7.name: Bogged Down
7.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds upon landing.
7.longDescription: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds upon landing.

7.name: Big As
7.description: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50% and enemy Heroes who are hit have their Armor reduced by 10 for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50% and enemy Heroes who are hit have their Armor reduced by 10 for 3 seconds.

7.name: Sticky Wicket
7.description: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Dirty Trickster
7.description: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by 20%.  When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below 50% Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping 5 grenades at his feet that explode.   This effect has a 12 second cooldown.
7.longDescription: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by 20%.  When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below 50% Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping 5 grenades at his feet that explode.   This effect has a 12 second cooldown.

10.name: RIP-Tire
10.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.
10.longDescription: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

10.name: Rocket Ride
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 815 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 815 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

13.name: Bombs Away
13.description: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by 1.  Frag Launcher grenades fired within 0.5 seconds of using a Basic Attack deal 25% bonus damage.
13.longDescription: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by 1.  Frag Launcher grenades fired within 0.5 seconds of using a Basic Attack deal 25% bonus damage.

13.name: Ripper Air
13.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.
13.longDescription: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

13.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
13.description: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 5 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 2.
13.longDescription: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 5 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 2.

16.name: Burst Fire
16.description: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.
16.longDescription: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

16.name: Endless Nades
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Spread Volley
16.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.
16.longDescription: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

20.name: Extra Oomph
20.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Puckish Scamp
20.description: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.
20.longDescription: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.

20.name: Cannonball!
20.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.
20.longDescription: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

20.name: I Hate Waiting!
20.description: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 150% increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to 12 seconds.
20.longDescription: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 150% increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Total Mayhem
abilities.description: Upon dying, drop 5 grenades that explode after 0.75 seconds, each dealing 250 damage to nearby enemies. Deals 75% less damage to Structures.Detonate MineDetonate an active Concussion MineBasic Attacks deal 100% splash damage in 2 radius.Basic Abilities can be used while moving.

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.description: Launch a grenade that explodes at the end of its path or upon hitting an enemy, dealing 118 damage to nearby enemies. Grenades can ricochet off of terrain. Deals 50% less damage to Structures.Stores up to 4 charges. Frag Launcher's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.There is 0.5 seconds cooldown inbetween charges.If the grenade lands on unpathable terrain, it explodes immediately without bouncing.

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.description: Place a mine on the ground. Junkrat's Trait can be activated to detonate the mine, dealing 180 damage to nearby enemies and knocking them back. Junkrat can also be affected by Concussion Mine, but takes no damage.Limit 1 active mine.The mine is invulnerable and untargetable and lasts indefinitely until detonation or placing another one.This ability knocks the targets hit into the air, making them fly over terrain.Distance of the knockback depends of how far is the target hit from the center of the ability's Area of Effect, with the longest being the farthest.Targets are knocked in air for 0.75-1.0 seconds depending on the launch distance.Concussion Mine provides vision in 3 radius.The area of effect is visible to enemies.Knockback maximum range: 10.5

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.description: Place a trap on the ground that arms after 2 seconds. Deals 130 damage to the first enemy that walks over it and Roots them for 2 seconds.Limit 1 active trap.The trap is invulnerable and untargetable and lasts indefinitely until triggering or placing another one.Steel Trap provides vision in 5 radius.

abilities.name: RIP-Tire
abilities.description: Create a motorized bomb with with 530 Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 775 damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 475 to enemies on the edge.RIP-Tire does not detonate if destroyed or expired.If Junkrat's channel gets interrupted, RIP-Tire instantly expires without detonating.Duration of crowd control effects against RIP-Tire are reduced by 75%.Detonating RIP-Tire deals high damage below 1.5 radius, mid damage in 1.5 - 4 radius and low damage in 4 - 6 radius.

abilities.name: Rocket Ride
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 815 damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.Junkrat is put in a special Stasis state for the duration of Rocket Ride, removing most debuffs, and making him immune to damage.Has movement speed of 6.

abilities.name: Jump
abilities.description: Activate to make RIP-Tire jump. Can be used to pass over terrain and Structures.This ability is available while controlling RIP-Tire.

1.name: Lion's Maw
1.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 125.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 125.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

1.name: Overpower
1.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.
1.longDescription: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 30% more damage.

1.name: High King's Quest
1.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

4.name: Taunt
4.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.
4.longDescription: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 30%.

4.name: Colossus Smash
4.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.
4.longDescription: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

4.name: Twin Blades of Fury
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 20%.

7.name: Lionheart
7.description: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%.
7.longDescription: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 50%.

7.name: Second Wind
7.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Victory Rush
7.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

10.name: Shield Wall
10.description: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.
10.longDescription: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

10.name: Warbringer
10.description: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.
10.longDescription: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

13.name: Juggernaut
13.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Mortal Strike

16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

20.longDescription: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

20.longDescription: Twin Blades of Fury increases Varian's Attack Speed by an additional 15%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

20.longDescription: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.longDescription: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%. When cast, increase Tychus's Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Casting Run And Gun reduces the cooldown of Minigun by 8 seconds.

4.longDescription: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

4.name: The Bigger They Are...

4.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds. Increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

4.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

7.longDescription: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

7.longDescription: Increases Frag Grenade's radius by 25% and the knockback distance by 100%.

7.longDescription: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

10.longDescription: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

10.longDescription: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.name: That's the Stuff!
13.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.
13.longDescription: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

13.name: Neosteel Coating

13.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

13.longDescription: Increases Overkill's range by 25%.

16.longDescription: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Overkill also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 30%.

16.longDescription: Increases Overkill's damage to the primary target by 50%.

20.name: Big Red Button

20.longDescription: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage in its area.

20.name: Focusing Diodes
20.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
20.description: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

20.name: Bob and Weave
20.description: Increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5.  Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.
20.longDescription: Increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5.  Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

abilities.name: Minigun
abilities.description: Activate to have your Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of their maximum Health. Lasts 3 seconds.Bonus damage from Minigun is dealt in a separate instance of Spell damage that is flagged to ignore any Armor.Minigun duration starts ath the first Basic Attack after activating the trait. Cooldown starts when the duration ends.

abilities.name: Overkill
abilities.description: Deal 552 (+4% per level) damage to the target and 276 (+4% per level) damage to nearby targets over 4 seconds. Reactivate to select a new target. Can move and use Abilities while channeling.Deals 46 damage to the primary target and 23 damage to the secondary targets every 0.33 seconds.

abilities.name: Annihilate
abilities.description: Fire the Odin's cannons in a straight line, dealing 196 (+4% per level) damage to everything in the path.Only available while Commandeer Odin is active.

abilities.name: Frag Grenade
abilities.description: Lob a grenade that deals 256 (+4% per level) damage, knocking enemies away.

abilities.name: Ragnarok Missiles
abilities.description: Launches a volley of missiles at target area, dealing 290 (138 + 4% per level) damage and slowing enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.Only available while Commandeer Odin is active.Impact has 1.5 second delay.

abilities.name: Run and Gun
abilities.description: Dash a short distance.

abilities.name: Thrusters
abilities.description: Dash in target direction.Only available while Commandeer Odin is active.

abilities.name: Drakken Laser Drill
abilities.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.Drakken Laser Drill is a stationary Summon.Damage is dealt every 0.5 seconds in ticks of 71 damage Spell damage.Drakken Laser Drill takes 2 seconds to set up. This makes its effective duration 20 seconds.Drakken Laser Drill has 1255 (+4% per level) Health.Cooldown starts when the ability is cast.

abilities.name: Commandeer Odin
abilities.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.It takes Tychus 2.75 seconds to enter the Odin, during which Tychus is Unstoppable. Armor bonus is instant.While piloting Odin, Tychus' Basic attack damage is set to 191 (+4% per level) and Attack Speed to 1.00/s.Tychus cannot use Minigun and Sizzling Attacks while piloting Odin.Odin's attack speed benefits from Master Assassin talent.Odin's Abilities use no mana.Cooldown starts when the ability is cast.

1.name: En Pointe

1.longDescription: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 90% damage to enemies hit by its end.

1.longDescription: When the wave of Dread hits 2 or more enemy Heroes, its eruption damage is increased by 60%.

1.longDescription: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 20% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies and grant 1 additional Chaos when hitting Heroes.

4.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 0.75 seconds.

4.description: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15% maximum Health.
4.longDescription: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15% maximum Health.

4.name: Fright
4.description: Dread's Slow also applies to enemies in Dread's path.
4.longDescription: Dread's Slow also applies to enemies in Dread's path.

7.name: Insatiable
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Ravenous Hunger
7.description: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

7.longDescription: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 4, up to 160.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

10.description: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Determination

13.longDescription: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos.

13.longDescription: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.

16.longDescription: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

16.name: Dead Magic

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to all enemies around the target.

16.description: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area.
16.longDescription: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area.

20.longDescription: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

20.longDescription: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 2 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

20.longDescription: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

20.name: Final Toccata

20.longDescription: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.

1.longDescription: Increases the duration of Polymorph by 0.75 seconds.

1.longDescription: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 2 seconds.

4.longDescription: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

4.longDescription: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

4.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 5 seconds.

7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

7.longDescription: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 (+4% per level) point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

7.longDescription: If Soothing Mist removes a disabling effect from an ally, heal them for 250 (+4% per level).

10.longDescription: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

13.longDescription: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 25% more.

13.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

16.longDescription: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
20.longDescription: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds. 16.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within 3 seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by 10 seconds, regardless of order.

16.longDescription: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.

20.longDescription: If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

10.name: Bunker Drop
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.
10.longDescription: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

7.longDescription: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals 180 (+4% per level) damage around the target and grants Imperius 300 (+4% per level) point Shield for 4 seconds.

7.name: Blaze of Glory
7.description: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage.  This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.
7.longDescription: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 125 (+4% per level) damage.  This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.

7.name: Holy Fervor
7.description: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.
7.longDescription: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.

10.name: Angelic Armaments
10.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.
10.longDescription: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

10.name: Wrath of the Angiris
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

13.name: Pathetic Mortals
13.description: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their damage by 40% for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their damage by 40% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Divine Rage
13.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.
13.longDescription: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.

13.name: Heat of Battle
13.description: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.
13.longDescription: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.

16.name: Celestial Swiftness
16.description: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.
16.longDescription: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.

16.name: Melting Touch
16.description: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25 for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25 for 4 seconds.

16.name: Valorous Pursuit
16.description: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

20.name: Heavenly Host
20.description: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage.
20.longDescription: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage.

20.name: Unrelenting Descent
20.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 5 seconds.

20.name: Impervious
20.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.

20.name: Brand of Solarion
20.description: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 3 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.
20.longDescription: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 3 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.

abilities.name: Valorous Brand
abilities.description: Each Basic Ability marks enemy Heroes hit for 10 seconds. Basic Attacks consume the target's marks, dealing 20% bonus damage per mark and healing for 75 per mark.Type: Attack modifier / Damage modifier: Physical damage, HealingScaling: 4.00% (heal)Affects: SelfA Hero can not be marked by the same Basic Ability more than once at a time. Further applications refresh the duration.Stacks additively with itself and other Physical damage modifiers.

abilities.name: Celestial Charge
abilities.description: Lunge towards a targeted direction and stab, dealing 35 damage. If an enemy Hero is hit, Channel to Stun for 1 second and deal 70 additional damage when it fully finishes.Type: Spell damage / Crowd Control / Movement: LaunchScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Stationary channel, StunCast time: 0.125+Ch+0.1875 secondsRange: 4Area of Effect: RectangleWidth: 1.25Height: 5.5Leap speed: 14Stun tickrate: 16 / second (x16)Imperius moves with a speed of 14 and is able to pass through terrain.Enemy Heroes hit are snapped towards the center line of the area within 1.5 - 4.5 units in front of Imperius.If the Channel lasts for full duration, the targets are Stunned for additional 0.25 seconds, while the bonus damage is being dealt.

abilities.name: Solarion's Fire
abilities.description: Release a fiery wave that deals 100 damage. Enemies hit by the center take 50 bonus damage and are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.Type: Spell damage / Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Skillshot (piercing), SlowCast time: 0.125+0 secondsRange: 10Hitbox: 3.75x1.5Missile speed: 8Center area width: 0.75The wave has a sight range of 2. The wave moves at a speed of 12, starts 0.5 units in front of Imperius and moves 10 units forwards.

abilities.name: Molten Armor
abilities.description: Shroud Imperius in flames for 3 seconds, striking a nearby enemy for 19 damage every 0.25 seconds. Imperius heals for 50% of the damage dealt increased to 100% against Heroes.Type: Spell damage / HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No target / AutomaticProperties: LifestealCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: 4Tickrate: 4 / second (x12)Can be activated while leaping or channeling Celestial Charge.Targets one enemy per tick prioritising the closest enemies. If there are multiple targets within the search area, the same target can not be hit again until all or up to 4 different targets in the area have been hit.Molten Armor will only hit revealed/visible targets.

abilities.name: Angelic Armaments
abilities.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 Shield for 3 seconds.If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 damage to the first enemy hit.Type: Shield / Spell damageScaling: 4.00% (both)Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No target / Point targetProperties: SkillshotCast time: Instant / 0.125+0 secondsRange: 11.25Hitbox: 1x1.5Missile speed: 28Sword spacing: 1.5Launch delay: 0.3125 seconds

abilities.name: Wrath of the Angiris
abilities.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving. After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 damage and Stunning them for 1 second.Type: Spell damage / Crowd control / Movement: Launch / Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes (damage, cc) / Enemy Heroes&Self (status effect)Targeting: Point targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary), Skillshot, Stasis (in air), Stun, Unstoppable (dash)Cast time: 0.75+0 secondsRange: 6Hitbox: 2x2Leap speed: 30Hitbox displacement: 1 (forward)Air movement speed: 5Interrupting the ability during it's cast puts it on a 10-second cooldown.Doesn't affect Vehicles.While in air both heroes are put in Stasis, removing most debuffs from and making them immune to damage.Landing location can't be steered over unpathable terrain.Upon landing the target enemy Hero is placed at the center of the indicator, facing Imperius. 1.name: Widowmakers
1.description: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.
1.longDescription: Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30%.

1.name: Pandemic
1.description: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.
1.longDescription: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

1.name: Thing of the Deep
1.description: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.

4.name: Hexed Crawlers
4.description: Corpse Spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.
4.longDescription: Corpse Spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

4.name: Big Voodoo
4.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.
4.longDescription: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

4.name: Blood Ritual
4.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.
4.longDescription: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

7.name: Spirit of Arachyr
7.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.
7.longDescription: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

7.name: Dead Rush
7.description: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Zombie Wall deals 75% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Toads of Hugeness
7.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.
7.longDescription: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

10.name: Gargantuan
10.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

10.name: Ravenous Spirit
10.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 216 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 216 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Guardian Toads
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Superstition
13.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 40 Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.name: Spider Colony
16.description: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by 0.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by 0.25 seconds.

16.name: Ring of Poison
16.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.
16.longDescription: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

16.name: Soul Harvest
16.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

20.name: Humongoid
20.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

20.name: Annihilating Spirit
20.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.
20.longDescription: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50% and Movement Speed by 30%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

20.name: Vile Infection
20.description: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Voodoo Ritual
abilities.description: Nazeebo's Basic Attacks and Abilities poison non-Heroic enemies, causing them to take 67 (+4% per level) additional damage over 6 seconds.  If a Minion dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, Nazeebo permanently gains 6 Health and 1 Mana.The Damage over Time effect does not stack.

abilities.name: Corpse Spiders
abilities.description: Hurl a jar of spiders that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage. If it hits at least one enemy, create 3 Corpse Spiders that attack for 38 (+4% per level) damage. Spiders last for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Zombie Wall
abilities.description: After 1 second, create a ring of Zombies surrounding the target area that deal 28 (+4% per level) damage and last for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Plague of Toads
abilities.description: Create a wave of 3 Toads that explode on contact, dealing 119 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds. This effect stacks.  Stores up to 2 charges.Maximum Damage over Time stacks: 20.

abilities.name: Gargantuan Stomp
abilities.description: Order your Gargantuan to stomp, dealing 331 (158 + 4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.Active while Gargantuan is alive.Can be activated while Nazeebo is dead.

abilities.name: Gargantuan
abilities.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

abilities.name: Ravenous Spirit
abilities.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 206 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.  Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.  Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.  Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.  Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.  Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.  Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.
4.longDescription: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.description: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.
4.longDescription: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 50% if they are afflicted by Corruption.
7.longDescription: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 50% if they are afflicted by Corruption.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.description: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.
13.longDescription: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.
16.longDescription: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: Dealing 600 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan 25% Spell Power for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dealing 600 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan 25% Spell Power for 5 seconds.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.
20.longDescription: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

abilities.name: Life Tap
abilities.description: 222 Life (+4% per level)Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana. Activate to restore 25% mana.Cannot be used, if Gul'dan is at maximum Mana or if using Life Tap would be lethal.

abilities.name: Fel Flame
abilities.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 200 (+4.5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Drain Life
abilities.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 (+4% per level) Health per second.Stationary channel, can be cancelled by reactivating the Ability.Damage and Healing are dealt 4 ticks/second to a total of 12 ticks.Cannot be used on Structures.

abilities.name: Corruption
abilities.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 (+4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Corruption can stack up to 3 times on an enemy.Damage is dealt 1 tick per second, but individually for every burst hit.A Hero can't be hit with more than 3 bursts per cast. Further bursts don't refresh the duration or increase the damage.

abilities.name: Horrify
abilities.description: After 0.5 seconds deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and forced to run away from Horrify's center.

abilities.name: Rain of Destruction
abilities.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.Type: Spell damageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary)Cast time: 1.5(ch) secondsRange: 10Interrupting the ability puts it on a 10-second cooldown. Gul'dan can interrupt the channel by issuing a "move" or "stop" command.Spawns total of 56 meteors in randomly chosen points in the AoE.

1.name: Live and Let Live
1.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.
1.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

1.name: Circle of Life
1.description: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.
1.longDescription: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

1.name: Flames of Fury
1.description: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.name: Surge of Vitality
4.description: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Heat Exhaustion
4.description: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.
4.longDescription: Increase Flame Buffet's initial Slow from 40% to 60%.

4.name: Exuberance
4.description: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.
4.longDescription: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Lifeblossom
7.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.
7.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

7.name: Verdant Flourish
7.description: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.
7.longDescription: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

7.name: Fire Within
7.description: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

10.name: Life-Binder
10.description: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.
10.longDescription: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

10.name: Cleansing Flame
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

13.name: Dragon Scales
13.description: Gain 40 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 40 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

13.name: Pacify
13.description: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

13.name: Life Unbound
13.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.
13.longDescription: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

16.name: Tough Love

abilities.name: Dragonqueen
abilities.description: After 1.25 seconds, transform into a dragon and gain 500 Health. While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Abilities are empowered, her Basic Attacks deal 143 damage and heal allied Heroes for 43 in an arc in front of her, and the duration of incoming Slows, Roots, and Stuns is reduced by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds.Type: TransformationScaling: 4.00%Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Attack modifier, CC reduction, Damage, Healing, Splash, Stationary channel (cast)Cast time: 1.25+0.5 secondsSplash arc: 50Interrupting Dragonqueen during its cast puts it on a 10-second cooldown.Dragonqueen grants Alexstrasza a different set of Basic Abilities, which have independent cooldowns and are unaffected by Alexstrasza's Talents that enhance her regular Basic Abilities.Dragonqueen's cooldown starts when the ability is successfully cast.Dragonqueen reduces attack speed to 0.80, resulting in increase of single-target Basic Attack DPS by roughly 57%.The moment the ability is successfully cast, and upon transformation back to human form, Alexstrasza enters a special Stasis for 0.5 seconds, removing debuffs and becoming invulnerable and untargetable for this period.

abilities.name: Drag
abilities.description: Lash out with your tongue, dealing 160 damage to the first enemy hit, stunning and dragging them with you for 1.75 seconds. If you are Stunned or Silenced while using Drag, the effect ends.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, Mobile channel, SkillshotChannel time (max): 1.75 secondsCast time: 0.1875+Ch+0 secondsRange: 6Width: 1.25

abilities.name: Dark Swarm
abilities.description: Deal 47 damage every 0.5 seconds to nearby enemies for 3.5 seconds. While active, you are able to move through units. Can be cast during Drag and Burrow.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of EffectCast time: InstantRange: 3.5Tickrate: 2 / second (x6)

abilities.name: Burrow
abilities.description: Burrow into the ground, entering Stasis and becoming Invulnerable for 2 seconds.Type: StasisAffects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Stationary channelCast time: InstantReactivate: Cancel Burrow - Cancels BurrowRemoves most debuffs from Dehaka on cast.

abilities.name: Isolation
abilities.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 damage, Silencing and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Only allows them to see a very short distance for 6 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Clamping, SkillshotCast time: 0.375+0.1875 secondsRange: 8Width: 1.75Supressed sight radius: 3.5Enemy Heroes hit by Isolation are revealed for 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Adaptation
abilities.description: After 4 seconds, Heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.Type: HealingScaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: DelayedCast time: Instant

abilities.name: Brushstalker
abilities.description: Activate to burrow to a bush on the Battleground.Passive: Gain 20% movement speed while in a bush and for 2 seconds after leaving.Type: Mobility: TeleportTargeting: Point targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary)Channel time: 2 secondsCast time: Ch+1.5 secondsRange: GlobalInterrupting Brushstalker during it's cast puts it on a 10-second cooldown.While travelling, Dehaka is Invulnerable for 1.5 seconds, removing most debuffs.

1.name: Unyielding Power
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.

1.name: Furious Spark
1.description: Every 5th hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 95 (+4% per level) bonus damage.
1.longDescription: Every 5th hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 95 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

1.name: Malicious Intent
1.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.
1.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.

4.name: Hateful Mending
4.description: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes.
4.longDescription: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

4.name: Static Barrier
4.description: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.

4.name: Spite
4.description: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 125%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 125%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Ghastly Armor
7.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.
7.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.

7.name: Frost Storm
7.description: Enemies near Shade of Mephisto are Slowed by 50% for 2 seconds. Hitting enemies with Skull Missile while Shade of Mephisto is active increases its Slow to 50%.
7.longDescription: Enemies near Shade of Mephisto are Slowed by 50% for 2 seconds. Hitting enemies with Skull Missile while Shade of Mephisto is active increases its Slow to 50%.

7.name: Trickery
7.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. After Shade of Mephisto expires, all Slows and Roots are removed from Mephisto.
7.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends. After Shade of Mephisto expires, all Slows and Roots are removed from Mephisto.

10.name: Consume Souls
10.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Durance of Hate
10.description: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

13.name: Abhorred Skull
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 20% Spell Power for 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 20% Spell Power for 6 seconds.

13.name: Hysteria
13.description: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.
13.longDescription: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.

13.name: Shard of Hate
13.description: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.

16.name: Lightning Reaction
16.description: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

16.name: Static Field
16.description: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Animosity
16.description: Activate to extend the duration of Lightning Nova by 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks while Lightning Nova is active cause an immediate pulse of Lightning Nova damage.
16.longDescription: Activate to extend the duration of Lightning Nova by 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks while Lightning Nova is active cause an immediate pulse of Lightning Nova damage.

20.name: Consumed by Hatred
20.description: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.
20.longDescription: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.

20.name: Unspeakable Horror
20.description: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.
20.longDescription: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.

20.name: Mimic
20.description: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.
20.longDescription: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

20.name: Shade Lord
20.description: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.
20.longDescription: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.

abilities.name: Lord Of Hatred
abilities.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Abilities reduces Mephisto's Basic Ability cooldowns. Skull Missile and Shade of Mephisto grant 1.5 seconds of cooldown reduction per Hero hit, and Lightning Nova grants 0.3 seconds per Hero hit.

abilities.name: Skull Missile
abilities.description: Conjure a skull that travels in the target direction after 0.75 seconds, dealing 127 damage to enemies hit and Slowing Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Skillshot, Slow, UninterruptableCast time: 0.125 secondsRange: 12.5Hitbox: 2x1.8Missile Speed: 17

abilities.name: Lightning Nova
abilities.description: A ring of lightning appears around Mephisto for 2.5 seconds. Enemies within the ring take 45 damage every 0.25 seconds. Each time a cast of Lightning Nova hits a Hero, its damage is increased by 3%, up to 30%.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, UninterruptableCast time: 0.125 secondsInner range: 4.5Outer range: 5.25Damage per tick: 48Tickrate: 4 / second (x11)Mephisto's 4.5 Basic Attack Range is the same as the Lightning Nova Inner Radius, meaning that AA move puts him at the correct distance.

abilities.name: Shade of Mephisto
abilities.description: Teleport to a location, dealing 78 damage to nearby enemies and leaving behind a Shade of Mephisto at Mephisto's original location. After 2.5 seconds, Mephisto is teleported back to the Shade's location.Type: Mobility: Teleport (primary cast) / DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: Self / EnemiesProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Self-castable, UninterruptableCast time: 0.125 secondsRange: 7.5Radius: 2.5The return always triggers regardless of any positive or negative status effects on Mephisto, with the exception of Stasis, which fully prevents relocation back to Shade's position.Teleporting back dismounts, interrupts mounting, hearthing and channeling objectives, but does not interrupt channeling ultimates or Warhead Junction's Nukes.
