1.name: Pulse Strike
1.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.
1.longDescription: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge from 10% to 20% against Heroes.

1.name: Slipstream
1.description: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increases the amount of time Recalled by 1 second.

1.name: Tracer Rounds
1.description: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks reveal enemies for 4 seconds.

4.name: Parting Gift
4.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.
4.longDescription: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 240 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets.

4.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
4.description: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.
4.longDescription: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.

4.name: Untouchable
4.description: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.
4.longDescription: Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 2%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

7.name: Jumper
7.description: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increases Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Blink's charges by 1, but also increases Blink's cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Bullet Time
7.description: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Blink by 0.15 seconds.

7.name: Spatial Echo
7.description: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.
7.longDescription: Hero Takedowns grant 2 charges of Blink.

10.name: Sticky Bomb
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Quantum Spike
10.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health.
10.longDescription: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 7% of the primary target's maximum Health.

10.name: Pulse Rounds
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

13.name: Bullet Spray
13.description: Increases Melee's radius by 32%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.
13.longDescription: Increases Melee's radius by 32%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

13.name: Ricochet
13.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.
13.longDescription: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 50% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

13.name: Leeching Rounds
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Tracer for 20% of their damage dealt.

16.name: Sleight of Hand
16.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.
16.longDescription: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

16.name: Focus Fire
16.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 91 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.
16.longDescription: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 91 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

16.name: Locked and Loaded
16.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.
16.longDescription: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

20.name: Get Stuffed!
20.description: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.
20.longDescription: Reduces Melee's cooldown by 3 seconds. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knocks the target away.

20.name: Total Recall
20.description: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.
20.longDescription: Recall's cooldown is increased by 8 seconds, but it heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

20.name: Composition B
20.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.
20.longDescription: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

abilities.name: Reload
abilities.description: Tracer can Basic Attack while moving, and after attacking 10 times she needs to reload over 0.75 seconds. Tracer can manually reload early by activating Reload.Tracer's effective attack speed with Reload is 5.0/s.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.description: Charge Cooldown: 9 secondsDash towards an area. Stores up to 3 charges.

abilities.name: Melee
abilities.description: Deal 220 (+4% per level) damage to a nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes. Gain 5% Pulse Bomb charge when using melee against an enemy, and 10% against Heroes.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.description: Tracer returns to the position she was at 3 seconds ago, refilling her ammo, and removing all negative status effects from herself.Tracer is put in Stasis for 0.75 seconds, removing most debuffs and making her untargetable and immune to damage.The destination of Recall is visible to enemy Heroes

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.description: Fire a short range bomb that attaches to an enemy, if it hits them. The bomb explodes after 2 seconds dealing 360 (+6% per level) damage to them and 180 (+6% per level) damage to other nearby enemies.This Ability is slowly charged over time by dealing damage to enemies with Basic Attacks and Melee.The ability is available from the start of the game as long as you have enough charge to activate it.Emptying one clip grants total of  6% charge regardless of damage dealt or the enemy.Enemies that walk over the middle of the bomb are considered primary targets and take the same damage as if the bomb was attached to them.

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds.

1.name: Reinforced Carapace
1.description: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 30%.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.
1.longDescription: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.

4.name: Needlespine2
4.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.
4.longDescription: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Increase the range of Toxic Nest by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.
4.longDescription: Increase the range of Toxic Nest by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.
7.longDescription: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.
7.longDescription: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.
10.longDescription: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.
10.longDescription: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.
13.longDescription: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.

16.name: Envenomed Spikes
16.description: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Adrenaline Boost
16.description: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.name: Volatile Mutation
16.description: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 75% of the damage dealt.
16.longDescription: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 75% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Locust Brood
16.description: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.
16.longDescription: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

20.name: Evolutionary Link
20.description: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%.  As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%.  As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 25% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.name: Evolution Complete
20.description: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.
20.longDescription: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.

20.name: Hivemind
20.description: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.
20.longDescription: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.

20.name: Locust Nest
20.description: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.
20.longDescription: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.Type: SummonScaling: 4.00%Affects: Allied Minions & LocustsTargeting: Unit targetCast time: InstantRange: GlobalMonstrosityType: MobileScaling: 4.00% (damage & health)Targeting: AutomaticHealth: 1350Basic Attack damage: 85Attack speed: 1/sAttack range: 0.5Movement Speed: 4Sight radius: 9Locust can use Deep Tunnel on an 80 second cooldown. This cooldown is separate from Abathur's.

abilities.name: Deep Tunnel
abilities.description: Quickly tunnel to a visible location.Type: Movement: TeleportAffects: SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary)Cast time: 2.5(ch)+0 secondsRange: GlobalDeep Tunnel can be cancelled by issuing a "move" or "stop" command.Deep Tunnel goes on a 10 second cooldown when interrupted by enemy or allied abilities, including self-cancelling.Deep Tunnel has an allied chat announcement upon activation.

1.name: Renew
1.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for 130 (+4% per level) over 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for 130 (+4% per level) over 5 seconds.

1.name: Pursued by Grace
1.description: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 33 (+4% per level).
1.longDescription: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 33 (+4% per level).

1.name: Bold Strategy
1.description: Anduin gains his other level 1 Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Anduin gains his other level 1 Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

4.name: Moral Compass
4.description: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at 2 Heroes close to its apex for 70% damage.
4.longDescription: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at 2 Heroes close to its apex for 70% damage.

4.name: Holy Reach
4.description: After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack has 50% more range, 75% more damage, and heals allied Heroes near Anduin for 100 (+4% per level).
4.longDescription: After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack has 50% more range, 75% more damage, and heals allied Heroes near Anduin for 100 (+4% per level).

4.name: Inner Fire
4.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Basic Attack range by 15%.
4.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Basic Attack range by 15%.

7.name: Binding Heal
7.description: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 104 (+4% per level).
7.longDescription: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 104 (+4% per level).

7.name: Power Word: Shield
7.description: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 172 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 172 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

7.name: Blessed Recovery
7.description: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)
7.longDescription: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)

10.name: Holy Word: Salvation
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

10.name: Lightbomb
10.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

13.name: Speed of the Pious
13.description: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.
13.longDescription: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.

13.name: Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.

13.name: Push Forward!
13.description: Damaging an enemy Hero grants 2.5% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 20%.
13.longDescription: Damaging an enemy Hero grants 2.5% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 20%.

16.name: Evenhanded Blessings
16.description: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, refund 50% of its cooldown.
16.longDescription: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, refund 50% of its cooldown.

16.name: Holy Nova
16.description: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 105 (+4% per level).
16.longDescription: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 105 (+4% per level).

16.name: Inner Focus
16.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 40% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 40% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.

16.name: Lightwell
16.description: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 75 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 10 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.
16.longDescription: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 75 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 10 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

20.name: Light of Stormwind
20.description: Holy Word: Salvation healing is increased to up to 30% of maximum Health and upon ending, allied Heroes gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Holy Word: Salvation healing is increased to up to 30% of maximum Health and upon ending, allied Heroes gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Glyph of Faith
20.description: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.
20.longDescription: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.

20.name: Varian's Legacy
20.description: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

20.name: Desperate Prayer
20.description: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for 540 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.  Using Desperate Prayer places Flash Heal on a 10 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for 540 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.  Using Desperate Prayer places Flash Heal on a 10 second cooldown.

1.name: Savor the Flavor
1.description: Quest: Using Devour on an enemy Hero permanently increases Stitches's Health Regeneration by 2 per second.
1.longDescription: Quest: Using Devour on an enemy Hero permanently increases Stitches's Health Regeneration by 2 per second.

1.name: Patchwork Creation
1.description: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%. Whenever a nearby enemy Minion dies, restore 30 (+4% per level) Health. Takedowns restore 240 (+4% per level) Health.
1.longDescription: Increase regeneration effects and all healing received by 15%. Whenever a nearby enemy Minion dies, restore 30 (+4% per level) Health. Takedowns restore 240 (+4% per level) Health.

1.name: Hungry for More
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30.  Reward: Every 15 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches's Movement Speed by 5%, up to 20%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Stitches's maximum Health by 30.  Reward: Every 15 Globes gathered permanently increases Stitches's Movement Speed by 5%, up to 20%.

4.name: Serrated Edge
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health, and reduces Hook's cooldown by 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health, and reduces Hook's cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Playtime!
4.description: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds, increased to 2 seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds, increased to 2 seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.

4.name: Chop Chop
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the inner impact area of Slam grants 50% increased Attack Speed for 6 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with the inner impact area of Slam grants 50% increased Attack Speed for 6 seconds.

7.name: Blight
7.description: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy Heroes hit receive 20% less healing for 5 seconds.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 33% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy Heroes hit receive 20% less healing for 5 seconds.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 33% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Cannibalize
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Stitches for 5% of his maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes heal Stitches for 5% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Tenderizer
7.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.

10.name: Putrid Bile
10.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Gorge
10.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.
10.longDescription: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

13.name: Lacerate
13.description: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Digestive Juices
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds.

13.name: Gas Flare
13.description: Deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by 150% for 8 seconds.
13.longDescription: Deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by 150% for 8 seconds.

16.name: Fishing Hook
16.description: Hook has an additional 50% range.
16.longDescription: Hook has an additional 50% range.

16.name: Meat Hook
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. For 4 seconds, Stitches's Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refreshes the healing duration.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds. For 4 seconds, Stitches's Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refreshes the healing duration.

16.name: Pulverize
16.description: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 75% for 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 75% for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Potent Bile
20.description: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its Slow is increased from 35% to 45%.
20.longDescription: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its Slow is increased from 35% to 45%.

20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
20.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.
20.longDescription: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

20.name: Second Helping
20.description: Devour gains 1 additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Devour gains 1 additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by 5 seconds.

20.name: Shambling Horror
20.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.  Passive: Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below 100%.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.  Passive: Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below 100%.

1.name: Longshot
1.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

1.name: Covert Ops
1.description: After being Stealthed for 4 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.
1.longDescription: After being Stealthed for 4 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

1.name: Advanced Cloaking
1.description: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.
1.longDescription: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.

4.name: Rapid Projection
4.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%.
4.longDescription: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%.

4.name: Holo Stability
4.description: Increase the cast range of Holo Decoy by 100% and its duration by 120%.
4.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Holo Decoy by 100% and its duration by 120%.

4.name: Covert Mission
4.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.
4.longDescription: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

7.name: Perfect Shot
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

7.name: One in the Chamber
7.description: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.

7.name: Anti-Armor Shells
7.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 15 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.
7.longDescription: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 15 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

10.name: Triple Tap
10.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.
10.longDescription: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

10.name: Precision Strike
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

13.name: Psionic Efficiency
13.description: Snipe's range is increased by 15% and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.
13.longDescription: Snipe's range is increased by 15% and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.

13.name: Double Tap
13.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Ionic Force Field
13.description: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.
13.longDescription: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.

16.name: Explosive Round

16.longDescription: Snipe also deals 90% damage to enemies near the impact.

16.name: Crippling Shot

16.longDescription: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

16.name: Lethal Decoy
16.description: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30% of Nova's damage.
16.longDescription: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30% of Nova's damage.

20.name: Fast Reload
20.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.
20.longDescription: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

20.name: Precision Barrage
20.description: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Apollo Suit
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

1.name: Scroll of Identify
1.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 16 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor of Heroes hit by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 16 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor of Heroes hit by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

1.name: Field Study
1.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.
1.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.

1.name: Sapphire
1.description: Activate to increase the Slow of the next Horadric Cube by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
1.longDescription: Activate to increase the Slow of the next Horadric Cube by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

4.name: Potion of Shielding
4.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.
4.longDescription: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

4.name: Rejuvenation Potion
4.description: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

4.name: Ruby
4.description: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube spawn 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
4.longDescription: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube spawn 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

7.name: Cube Mastery
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25.  Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25.  Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.

7.name: Kanai's Cube
7.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Emerald
7.description: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
7.longDescription: Activate to make the next Horadric Cube reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
10.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

10.name: Lorenado
10.description: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

13.name: Super Healing Potion
13.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 120% more.
13.longDescription: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 120% more.

13.name: Potion of Revival
13.description: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 50% of the healing amount.
13.longDescription: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 50% of the healing amount.

13.name: Ancient Blessings
13.description: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.
13.longDescription: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

16.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
16.description: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.
16.longDescription: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

16.name: Safety in Numbers
16.description: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 15 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.
16.longDescription: If at least 3 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 15 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

16.name: Horadric Staff
16.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Respect the Elderly
20.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.
20.longDescription: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

20.name: Morenados!
20.description: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Bottomless Flask
20.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.
20.longDescription: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.

20.name: Perfect Gems
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems by 25 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Fortitude of the Faithful
abilities.description: When at least 1 other allied Hero is nearby, Deckard gains 10 Armor and his Basic Abilities recharge 50% faster.Type: Damage modifier: Armor / Cooldown reductionAffects: SelfRange: 6

abilities.name: Healing Potion
abilities.description: Throw a Healing Potion on the ground that heals the first allied Hero that comes in contact with it for 270. Limit 5 active Potions.Type: HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Self, Allied HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Self-castableCast time: 0.125+0 secondsRange: 8Radius: 1Travel time: 0.625s, 0.4375s, 0.125sHealing Potions do not grant any vision.Healing Potion cannot be picked up by a Hero at full health.Travel time has three possible values depending on the distance of the toss.

abilities.name: Horadric Cube
abilities.description: Release the Horadric Cube. After 0.5 seconds it explodes, dealing 80 damage to all enemies in the area and Slowing them by 35% for 1.75 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Slow, Self-castableCast time: 0.125+0 secondsRange: 12Missile speed: 20Travel time: 0.6s (max range)Area of Effect: 8x8 square

abilities.name: Scroll of Sealing
abilities.description: Unfurl an enchanted scroll over 2.25 seconds, forming a triangle that deals 150 damage to enemies inside and Roots them for 1.5 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Root, Self-castableCast time: 0.1875sRange: 12Area of Effect: Equilateral triangle (side: 12)

abilities.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
abilities.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after. Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.Type: SleepAffects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point TargetProperties: Area of Effect, ClampingRange: 10Arc: 150Sleep cannot be interrupted for the first 0.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Lorenado
abilities.description: Vector TargetingAfter 1 second, create a swirling tome tornado that travels in the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.Type: KnockbackAffects: EnemiesTargeting: Vector TargetingProperties: Area of EffectCast time: 0.1875sRange: 14Radius: 2.5Total travel distance: 18Travel speed: 3Knockback distance: 4.375

1.name: Maximum Effort
1.description: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times it deals an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage and Slows by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times it deals an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage and Slows by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Fatal Wounds
1.description: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 40% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage.  Reward: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 200 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 40% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage.  Reward: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 200 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds.

1.name: Finishing Touch
1.description: When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below 50% Health it deals 30% additional damage, and she gains 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below 50% Health it deals 30% additional damage, and she gains 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Upstage
4.description: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Heroic Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.
4.longDescription: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Heroic Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.

4.name: Ensnaring Swing
4.description: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by 30% while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by 30% while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Your Pain, My Gain
4.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

7.name: The Thirst
7.description: Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds against an enemy Hero deals 12% additional damage and restores 50% of the total damage dealt as Health. Damage stacks up to 10 times.
7.longDescription: Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds against an enemy Hero deals 12% additional damage and restores 50% of the total damage dealt as Health. Damage stacks up to 10 times.

7.name: Healmonger
7.description: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 190 (+4% per level) Health.
7.longDescription: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 190 (+4% per level) Health.

7.name: Siphoning Link
7.description: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate 96 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.
7.longDescription: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate 96 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.

10.name: Unrelenting Strikes
10.description: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1 second.
10.longDescription: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1 second.

10.name: Final Strike
10.description: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.

13.name: Chainsaw
13.description: Carnage's cooldown recharges 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.
13.longDescription: Carnage's cooldown recharges 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.

13.name: Pulsing Pain
13.description: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 115 (+4% per level) damage.
13.longDescription: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 115 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: The Hunted
13.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.

16.name: Booming Kick
16.description: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by 0.25 seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.
16.longDescription: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by 0.25 seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.

16.name: Lingering Ailment
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep's initial impact and swing have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep's initial impact and swing have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.

16.name: Swing Life Away
16.description: Revolving Sweep's cooldown recharges 150% faster while Qhira is swinging around her target. She also gains 50 Spell Armor for 2 seconds after the re-activation impact.
16.longDescription: Revolving Sweep's cooldown recharges 150% faster while Qhira is swinging around her target. She also gains 50 Spell Armor for 2 seconds after the re-activation impact.

20.name: Silent Killer
20.description: The initial cast of Unrelenting Strikes Silences enemies who are within the area for 2 seconds and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds when hitting enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: The initial cast of Unrelenting Strikes Silences enemies who are within the area for 2 seconds and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds when hitting enemy Heroes.

20.name: Unleashed Potential
20.description: Increase the damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health from 25% to 50%.  If an enemy Hero dies within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Final Strike, then reset the cooldowns of Final Strike and all of Qhira's Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Increase the damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health from 25% to 50%.  If an enemy Hero dies within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Final Strike, then reset the cooldowns of Final Strike and all of Qhira's Basic Abilities.

20.name: Utility Belt
20.description: Grappling Hook's cooldown is reset when hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Revolving Sweep and recharges 900% faster if Qhira hasn't taken damage within the last 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Grappling Hook's cooldown is reset when hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Revolving Sweep and recharges 900% faster if Qhira hasn't taken damage within the last 5 seconds.

20.name: No Sanctuary
20.description: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed and you gain 20% Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way.  Additionally, you deal 20% increased damage to these revealed enemies.
20.longDescription: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed and you gain 20% Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way.  Additionally, you deal 20% increased damage to these revealed enemies.

abilities.name: Grappling Hook (Trait)
abilities.description: Qhira fires a Grappling Hook that pulls her to terrain it contacts. If an enemy Hero is hit, they take 35 damage and Qhira launches at them, kicking them for an additional 108 damage.Can be used while Revolving Sweep is active.Type: Spell damage / Movement: LaunchScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: SkillshotCast time: InstantRange: 11Hitbox: 1.0x1.15Missile speed: 25

abilities.name: Carnage
abilities.description: Unleash your sword in a targeted direction, continuously dealing 30 damage to enemies caught in its path.Type: Spell damageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Stationary channelCast time: 0.125+Ch+0 secondsArea of Effect: RectangleWidth: 1.25Height: 8.5Channel time: 0.5625 secondsThe area grows to its maximum length in 4 ticks over 0.25 seconds, dealing damage every tick. After additional 0.3125 seconds the sword is pulled back dealing an additional tick of damage to all targets.

abilities.name: Blood Rage
abilities.description: Passive: Basic Attack and Ability damage cause enemies to bleed for 44 damage over 4 seconds. Stacks 5 times.Active:  Qhira deals 32 damage and heals for 85 Health per enemy Hero affected. Damage and healing is increased by 50% per each additional stack on that Hero.Type: Spell damage / HealingScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemies / SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Damage over TimeCast time: InstantRange: GlobalTickrate: 1.0 per second (x4)Damage per tick: 11Active component is disabled, if no enemies are affected by the passive.Subsequent applications of the DoT add to its damage and refresh its duration.Damage from either Blood Rage's active or passive do not add or refresh any stacks.Damage from both bleed and activation can affect non-Heroes, but do not trigger healing.Damage and healing bonuses from the active component stack additively with itself and multiplicatively with other modifiers.

abilities.name: Revolving Sweep
abilities.description: Attach your sword to the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 96 damage and Stunning them for 0.25 seconds. Once attached, Qhira avoids Basic Attacks and becomes immune to all effects, rotating around the target for 2.75 seconds, and dealing 105 damage to any enemies between you and the target.Reactivate to send you to the target's location, knocking them away, dealing 108 damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.Type: Spell damage Crowd control / Movement: Launch, Status effectScaling: 4.00%Affects: Enemy Heroes / SelfTargeting: Point targetProperties: Knockback, Skillshot, StunCast time: 0.125+0.75 secondsRange: 8Radius: 6 (swing)Hitbox: - Initial: 1.0x1.15- Swing: 0.75x5.5Missile speed: 25 (initial)Knockback duration: 0.1875Knockback speed: 12If the ability has not been reactivated or interrupted, swinging stops after completing one full circle and Qhira is placed at range distance from the target.Rotation is always clockwise and at set distance from the target.Qhira is unable to attack, move or use her abilities other than Grappling Hook and Revolving Sweep's reactivation.Swing behaviour is instantly removed, dropping Qhira at her current location (as long as it's on pathable surface), if:- the target becomes Unstoppable or Invulnerable- the target instantly moves more than 10 units- the target is Falstad during Flight or Ragnaros during Molten Core- the target or Qhira is put in Stasis or Time Stop- Qhira latches on to a Hero or terrain with Grappling Hook.While Qhira is swinging, she is Unstoppable and untargetable, nullifies all incoming damage, Evades Basic Attacks and has no collision.

abilities.name: Unrelenting Strikes
abilities.description: Deal 44 damage to all nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 83 damage to all nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 0.75 seconds.Type: Spell damage, Crowd controlScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Mobile channel, StunCast time: InstantArea of Effect: CircleRadius: - Initial: 1.5- Final: 3.5Tickrate: 2.0/second (x6)Qhira can activate Blood Rage, while channeling Unrelenting Strikes without interrupting it. Qhira cannot use any other abilities or attack during the channel.First 2 ticks strike at the initial radius, after which it grows in 0.5 increments.Final damage is dealt in a separate instance on the last tick in addition to the periodic damage.

abilities.name: Final Strike
abilities.description: After 1 second, deal 415 damage to all enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes below 50% Health.Type: Spell damageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Channeled cast, SkillshotCast time: 1.0(ch)+0.5 secondsRange: 20Hitbox: 3.0x1.5Missile speed: 36Interrupting the ability during its cast puts it on a 10 second cooldown.Low health damage bonus stacks additively with other damage modifiers affecting Qhira's spell damage output.

1.name: Target Practice
1.description: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.

1.name: Simple Geometry
1.description: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.  Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.  Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

1.name: Redemption
1.description: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.  Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.  Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

4.name: Explosive Arrows
4.description: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 60% of its damage to enemies around its target.
4.longDescription: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 60% of its damage to enemies around its target.

4.name: Serrated Arrows
4.description: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
4.longDescription: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

4.name: Ignore All Distractions
4.description: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.

7.name: The Dragon Hungers
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

7.name: Never Outmatched
7.description: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 50 to 30. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 50 to 30. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.

7.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.

10.name: Dragonstrike
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.

10.name: Dragon's Arrow
10.description: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.
10.longDescription: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

13.name: Fleet of Foot
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ninja Assassin
13.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.
13.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

13.name: Mounted Archery
13.description: Upon mounting, gain 25% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.
13.longDescription: Upon mounting, gain 25% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

16.name: Flawless Technique
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 30%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 30%.
16.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 30%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 30%.

16.name: Piercing Arrows
16.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.
16.longDescription: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

16.name: Giant Slayer
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: The Dragon Awakens
20.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 4 seconds.

20.name: Play of the Game
20.description: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 132 (+4% per level) damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.
20.longDescription: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 132 (+4% per level) damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

20.name: Bullseye
20.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

20.name: Perfect Agility
20.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Natural Agility
abilities.description: Target unpathable terrain or a Structure to jump to the other side of it.Type: Mobility: LaunchAffects: SelfTargeting: Automatic (unpathable terrain)/ Point TargetProperties: ClampingCast time: InstantRange: 9Natural Agility can't be used, if there is no unpathatble terrain between Hanzo and target point, or if there are no viable landing spots in range.Hanzo can't use Natural Agility to jump over player-created objects or friendly Gate.Hanzo always lands 2 range from the edge of the terrain, regardless of its width.

abilities.name: Storm Bow
abilities.description: Activate to charge an arrow that deals 291 damage to the first enemy hit. Storm Bow's range increases the longer it is Channeled. 1.name: Rush-down
1.description: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.
1.longDescription: If D.Va neither takes nor deals damage during Boosters, its cooldown is lowered by 7 seconds.

1.name: Hit The Nitrous
1.description: Initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.
1.longDescription: Initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 325%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters deals 50% extra damage.

1.name: Crash Course
1.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Boosters.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, each use of Boosters lowers its cooldown by 1 second per Hero hit.

1.name: Pro Moves
1.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.
1.longDescription: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed for 1.5 seconds every time it takes damage, up to 30%.

4.name: Diverting Power
4.description: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% for the duration.
4.longDescription: The area of Defense Matrix is 100% wider and 25% longer, but D.Va's Movement Speed is reduced by 30% for the duration.

4.name: Get through This!
4.description: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase the duration of Defense Matrix by 3 seconds.

4.name: Fusion Generator
4.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.
4.longDescription: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%.  Max of 15% Charge gained per use.

4.name: Bring It On
4.description: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.
4.longDescription: Self-Destruct's Charge amount gained from losing Mech Health is increased by 30%.

7.name: Coming Through
7.description: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.
7.longDescription: Knockback distance of Boosters is increased by 100%.

7.name: Dazer Zone
7.description: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes affected by Defense Matrix are Slowed by 20%.

7.name: Aggression Matrix
7.description: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks in Mech Mode against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.25 seconds.

7.name: Nuclear Option
7.description: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Self Destruct's detonation timer by 3 seconds. Detonation damage increased by 70%.  A new Mech can still be called after 4 seconds.

10.name: Bunny Hop
10.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.
10.longDescription: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies by 40%. Lasts 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

10.name: Big Shot
10.description: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.
10.longDescription: Deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. The cooldown of Call Mech is reduced by 8 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.  Requires Pilot Mode.

13.name: Expensive Plating
13.description: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.
13.longDescription: Increase Mech Health by 20%, but also increase the cooldown of Call Mech by 15 seconds.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

13.name: Emergency Shielding
13.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 210 (+4% per level) damage over 6 seconds.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

13.name: Ablative Armor
13.description: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health is reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.
13.longDescription: Damage against D.Va's Mech that would deal 4% or less of its maximum Health is reduced by 50%.  This does not decrease the amount of Self-Destruct Charge gained.

16.name: Torpedo Dash
16.description: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.
16.longDescription: D.Va gains the Torpedo Dash ability, allowing her to dash forward and pass through enemies.  Requires Pilot Mode.

16.name: GG, WP
16.description: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.
16.longDescription: Increase Pilot Mode Basic Attack damage by 50%. Participating in a Takedown while in Pilot Mode instantly refreshes the cooldown of Call Mech.

16.name: Nanoweave Suit
16.description: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.
16.longDescription: For 4 seconds after ejecting from her Mech, D.Va gains 50 Armor and her Basic Attacks grant 50% more cooldown reduction towards Call Mech.

16.name: Suppressing Fire
16.description: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Pilot Mode Basic Attacks have 20% increased range and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Stop and Pop
20.description: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.
20.longDescription: Bunny Hop deals 200% more damage if D.Va isn't moving at the moment of impact.

20.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
20.description: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.
20.longDescription: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 50% damage.

20.name: Concussive Pulse
20.description: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.
20.longDescription: D.Va gains the Concussive Pulse ability, allowing her to deal 141 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back.  Requires Pilot Mode.

20.name: MEKAfall
20.description: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.
20.longDescription: Call Mech is instant and can target a location. Upon landing, the Mech deals 202 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the impact area.

abilities.name: Mech Mode
abilities.description: When D.Va's Mech is destroyed, she is ejected after 0.75 seconds and can continue to fight in Pilot Mode. Destroying D.Va's Mech only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP.Attack area length: 3.75Attack area width: 2

abilities.name: Pilot Mode
abilities.description: Each Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Call Mech by 0.5 seconds. As a Pilot, D.Va only awards 50% of a normal Hero's XP upon death.D.Va can Mount while in Pilot Mode.

abilities.name: Boosters (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Increases D.Va's Movement Speed by 125% for 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit take 135 damage and are knocked away.D.Va cannot be Slowed while Boosters are active, and each enemy can only be hit once per use.Type: Damage / Mobility: DashScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Knockback, Mobile channel, Movement Speed buffCast time: InstantKnockback distance: 2Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsReactivate: Cancel Boosters - Cancels BoostersThe movement speed during Boosters is calculated after the 100% baseline, and therefore is 225%, instead of 210%.

abilities.name: Defense Matrix (Mech Mode)
abilities.description: Channel a defensive field in the target direction for 3 seconds, reducing damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside it by 75%. The Mech can move while channeling, but cannot turn.Damage dealt to the Mech by enemies within Defense Matrix still grants the same amount of Self-Destruct Charge.Type: Damage modifier: DebuffScaling: -Affects: Enemy HeroesTargeting: Point targetProperties: Area of Effect, Clamping, Mobile channelCast time: 0.125+0 secondsOffset range: 0.5Lenght: 6.5Inner width: 2Outer width: 6Reactivate: Cancel Defense Matrix - Cancels Defense Matrix.Once cast the direction D.Va is facing is locked, but is otherwise able to move freely.The debuff lasts 0.3 seconds, and is reapplied every 0.0625s (reapplying refreshes the duration). So if enemies walk out of your Defense Matrix and try to deal damage immediately after, the 75% damage reduction is still applied.Defense Matrix reduces the damage of enemy heroes in the area at the time. All other times or areas are redundant. E.g. if an enemy Kael'thas cast Pyroblast, use Defense Matrix on Kaelthas when the pyroblast hits.Defense Matrix does not work on percentage damage abilities, vehicles and non-heroic targets like structures, minions and mercanaries.

abilities.name: Self-Destruct
abilities.description: Requires Mech Mode. Eject from the Mech, setting it to self-destruct after 4 seconds. Deals 400 to 1200 damage in a large area, depending on distance from the center of the blast. Deals 50% damage against Structures.Gain 1% Charge for every 2 seconds spent using Basic Attacks, and 30% Charge per 100% of Mech Health lost.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, KnockbackCast time: InstantRadius: 10Knockback distance: 3Knockback duration: 0.1875 secondsThe Explosion deals 1200 damage to the closest enemies, while the furthest enemies are hit for 400 at 10 range.Can be activated while Boosters are active, and Boosters can be deactivated after leaving the Mech.If Mech has taken fatal damage Self-Destruct can not be used, unless Boosters are active.Successfully casting Self-Destruct reduces Call Mech's cooldown to 4 seconds and turns D.Va's Mech into an Unkillable Heroic Pet.Ejected Mech can be affected by Crowd Control, including Polymorph, and Stasis effects like Stitches' Gorge.Crowd Control effects neither delay nor suppress Mech's explosion, they can only affect its position. The explosion can only be delayed by the Time Stop effect.Using Self-Destruct to eject from the Mech awards no experience to enemies.Attacking multiple targets at the same time does not increase charge gained.

abilities.name: Call Mech
abilities.description: Requires Pilot Mode. Call a new Mech and enter Mech Mode. 45 second cooldown. While in Pilot Mode, each Basic Attack lowers this cooldown by 0.5 seconds.Type: -Scaling: -Affects: SelfTargeting: No targetProperties: Channeled cast (stationary)Cast time: 0.5+0 secondsEntering the Mech successfully fully heals D.Va's pilot form and removes most debuffs.Interruoting Call Mech during it's cast puts it on a 4-second cooldown.

Lasts 4 seconds.Type: DamageScaling: 4.00%Affects: EnemiesTargeting: No targetProperties: Area of Effect, Mobile channel, Unstoppable, SlowCast time: InstantRadius: 5Reactivate: Cancel Bunny Hop - Cancels Bunny Hop
