abilities.name: Mechanized Walker
abilities.description: While in her Mech, D.Va can shoot while moving, but her base movement speed is reduced by 15%.

1.name: Feast on Fear
1.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.
1.longDescription: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

1.name: Soul Shield
1.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Sacrificial Soul
4.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 25 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 50.
4.longDescription: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 5 Souls and 25 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 50.

4.name: Souls to the Flame
4.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.
4.longDescription: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

4.name: Life Leech
4.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3% of his maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 1.5% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 3% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Eternal Flames
7.description: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and Diablo gains 35 Mana.
7.longDescription: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and Diablo gains 35 Mana.

7.name: Malevolence
7.description: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.
7.longDescription: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 1.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.  Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.  Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.  Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.  Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Cruelty
13.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.
13.longDescription: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

13.name: Hellfire
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.  While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.  While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.
16.longDescription: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.
16.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.
20.longDescription: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Hellstorm
20.description: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.
20.longDescription: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.
20.longDescription: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Black Soulstone

1.name: Light of Karabor
1.description: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Vindication's healing by 40%. If more than one Hero is hit, the bonus is increased to 80%.
1.longDescription: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Vindication's healing by 40%. If more than one Hero is hit, the bonus is increased to 80%.

1.name: Dauntless
1.description: Casting a Basic Ability grants Yrel 50 Physical Armor for 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Casting a Basic Ability grants Yrel 50 Physical Armor for 2 seconds.

1.name: Maraad's Insight
1.description: After damaging an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack heals her for 128 (+4% per level).
1.longDescription: After damaging an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack heals her for 128 (+4% per level).

4.name: Aegis of Light
4.description: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes 25 Armor for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

4.name: Gift of the Naaru
4.description: Divine Purpose heals the lowest Health nearby allied Hero other than Yrel for 275 (+4% per level).
4.longDescription: Divine Purpose heals the lowest Health nearby allied Hero other than Yrel for 275 (+4% per level).

4.name: Hand of Freedom
4.description: Grant an allied Hero 35% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and remove all Slows and Roots from them.
4.longDescription: Grant an allied Hero 35% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and remove all Slows and Roots from them.

7.name: Righteous Momentum
7.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Yrel is no longer Slowed while Channeling Righteous Hammer, and instead this bonus is quadrupled.
7.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Yrel is no longer Slowed while Channeling Righteous Hammer, and instead this bonus is quadrupled.

7.name: Holy Avenger
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge reduces its cooldown to 1 second.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge reduces its cooldown to 1 second.

7.name: Divine Steed
7.description: Mounting is instant and grants 60% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Mounting is instant and grants 60% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

10.name: Ardent Defender
10.description: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.
10.longDescription: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

10.name: Sacred Ground
10.description: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 50 Armor until she leaves the area.
10.longDescription: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 50 Armor until she leaves the area.

13.name: Aldor Peacekeeper
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.

13.name: Repentance
13.description: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by 25% and duration by 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by 25% and duration by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Velen's Chosen
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

16.name: Templar's Verdict
16.description: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 6% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 6% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Divine Favor
16.description: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Holy Wrath
16.description: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for 20% increased damage around the target.
16.longDescription: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for 20% increased damage around the target.

20.name: Word of Glory
20.description: Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for 100% of the healing received by Yrel.
20.longDescription: Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for 100% of the healing received by Yrel.

20.name: Hallowed Ground
20.description: Casting Avenging Wrath while inside Sacred Ground moves Sacred Ground to Yrel's location upon landing.

abilities.name: Cyber Agility
abilities.description: Activate to jump to target area.Can go over walls and terrain.

abilities.name: Shuriken
abilities.description: Throw 3 Shuriken in a spread pattern, each dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.Stores up to 3 charges. Shuriken's cooldown replenishes all charges at the same time.There is 0.5 second cooldown inbetween charges.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.description: Channel for 1.25 seconds, becoming Protected and blocking damage. Any damage blocked while channeling causes Genji to throw a Kunai toward the nearest enemy, prioritizing Heroes and dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage.Damage over time effects and Abilities that deal periodic damage proc Deflect on every tick of damage.If the channel gets interrupted by a Stun or a Silence, the damage of the Ability that caused the interruption still gets deflected.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.description: Dash forward, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line. Enemy Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit with Swift Strike cause the cooldown and mana cost to be refunded.Can go over walls and terrain. Trying to dash into a middle of terrain ends the dash at the edge of terrain closest to destination point.

abilities.name: Dragonblade
abilities.description: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.Dragonblade replaces Shuriken for its duration and can be reactivated with both Q and R keysGenji is unable to reactivate Dragonblade if he is Silenced or Rooted.

abilities.name: X-Strike
abilities.description: Perform two slashes dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage. The slashes detonate after 1.25 seconds causing an additional 270 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in their area.Slashes are aligned 45 degrees to both sides from the direction Genji is facing, first slash hitting towards his right hand side. Genji turns before ability is cast.For the duration of the slash animation, Genji is put in a special Stasis, removing most debuffs and making him untargetable and immune to damage.Self-casting the ability makes Genji move forward a bit.

4.name: Uppercut
4.description: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.
4.longDescription: Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 7% of their max Health.

4.name: Rollback
4.description: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.
4.longDescription: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

4.name: Seared Flesh
4.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.
4.longDescription: Each consecutive Basic Attack to an enemy Hero deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a different enemy is attacked.

7.name: Power Surge
7.description: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each Hero hit by Surging Fist reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

7.name: Firestarter
7.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

7.name: Enraged Regeneration
7.description: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.
7.longDescription: While Gall's Ogre Rage is active, Cho's Health Regeneration is increased by 200%.

10.name: Hammer of Twilight
10.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.
10.longDescription: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

10.name: Upheaval
10.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Surging Dash
13.description: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.
13.longDescription: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

13.name: Twilight Veil
13.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 100% for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.
13.longDescription: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide by 100% for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

13.name: Molten Block
13.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.
13.longDescription: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

16.name: Frenzied Fists
16.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.
16.longDescription: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

16.name: Runic Feedback
16.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.
16.longDescription: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Runed Gauntlet
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 5%.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 5%.

20.name: C'Thun's Gift
20.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
20.description: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: The Will of Cho
20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.
20.longDescription: Takedowns permanently increase the Armor granted by Ogre Hide by 2, to a max of 50 extra Armor.

20.name: Hour of Twilight
20.description: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.
20.longDescription: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

abilities.name: Ogre Hide
abilities.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, but reduce Gall's damage by 25%.Type: Damage modifier: Armor, DamageAffects: Self, GallTargeting: No targetCast time: InstantThe ability is placed on cooldown once Gall activates Ogre Rage.

abilities.name: Surging Fist
abilities.description: Activate to begin charging Surging Fist. Activate again to dash forward, knocking aside enemies and dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage. The dash range increases by up to 250%, depending on how long it is charged.

abilities.name: Consuming Blaze
abilities.description: Ignite nearby enemies, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds. Basic Attacking burning enemies re-Ignites them. Cho is healed for 40 (+4% per level) when an enemy is Ignited.

abilities.name: Rune Bomb
abilities.description: Roll a bomb dealing 91 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in its path. Gall can use Runic Blast to detonate it to deal 221 (+4% per level) damage in an area.

abilities.name: Hammer of Twilight
abilities.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and stuning them for 0.75 seconds. Passive:Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

abilities.name: Upheaval
abilities.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

1.name: Keep Moving!
1.description: Increases the duration of Shove's Movement Speed bonus by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increases the duration of Shove's Movement Speed bonus by 2 seconds.

1.name: Taskmaster
1.description: Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the cooldown of Shove by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

1.name: We See You!
1.description: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 25 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.
1.longDescription: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 25 seconds and its range is increased by 33%.

4.name: Double Back
4.description: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.  Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 50% more damage to Heroic targets, and 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.
4.longDescription: Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.  Passive: The third bounce of Dread Orb deals 50% more damage to Heroic targets, and 200% more damage to Non-Heroic targets.

4.name: Runic Persistence
4.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.
4.longDescription: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

4.name: Bomb's Away
4.description: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

7.name: Edge of Madness
7.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 7 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 8% damage, to a maximum of 40%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 7 seconds.

7.name: Double Trouble
7.description: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 0.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Ogre Rampage
7.description: Increase the damage bonus of Ogre Rage by 5%. Gall's Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.
7.longDescription: Increase the damage bonus of Ogre Rage by 5%. Gall's Basic Abilities cooldown 75% faster for 5 seconds after Cho activates Ogre Hide.

10.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
10.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

10.name: Twisting Nether
10.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Searing Shadows
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

13.name: Rising Dread
13.description: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.
13.longDescription: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%.

13.name: Twilight Nova
13.description: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.
13.longDescription: After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

16.name: Shadowsnare
16.description: Shadowflame Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.
16.longDescription: Shadowflame Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

16.name: Leaden Orb
16.description: Dread Orb Stuns enemy Heroes for 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dread Orb Stuns enemy Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Deafening Blast
16.description: Runic Blast Silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Runic Blast Silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Shadowfury
20.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.
20.longDescription: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

20.name: Shifting Nether
20.description: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins Channeling.
20.longDescription: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins Channeling.

20.name: The Will of Gall
20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.
20.longDescription: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.

20.name: Psychotic Break
20.description: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.

abilities.name: Ogre Rage
abilities.description: Activate to increase Gall's damage by 25%, but reduce Cho's armor by 25.Passive: Gall is permanently immune to Stun and Silence effects.Type: Damage modifier: Damage, ArmorAffects: Self, ChoTargeting: No targetCast time: InstantThe ability is placed on cooldown once Cho activates Ogre Hide.

abilities.name: Shadowflame
abilities.description: Deal 135 (+5% per level) damage to enemies in the area.

abilities.name: Dread Orb
abilities.description: Throw a bomb that will bounce three times, dealing 119 (+5% per level) damage to enemies.

abilities.name: Runic Blast
abilities.description: Detonate Cho's Rune Bomb, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage around it.

abilities.name: Twisting Nether
abilities.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Detonate Twisting Nether
abilities.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

abilities.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
abilities.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

abilities.name: Eye of Kilrogg
abilities.description: Place an eye, granting vision of a large area around it for 45 seconds. The eye can be killed by enemies with 2 Basic Attacks. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Shove
abilities.description: Nudge Cho a small distance and grant him 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
